loans.use: to hire laborers

loans.name: Anally

texts.en:
Anally is 29 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single with one child. 

Anally has a food shop that sells "banana-cue" (fried bananas on a stick). She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 5,000 PHP to buy ripe bananas needed  for making snacks to sell.

Anally is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, Anally hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy ripe bananas needed  for making snacks to sell

loans.name: Abdullah

texts.en:
Abdullah is a 51-year-old married man and father of eight children who lives in Sana`a, Yemen. 

Approximately five years ago Abdullah started his business, a grocery store selling staples. He did this in order to generate enough income to support his household, where he lives with his wife and eight children. This business is Abdullah’s source of income so that he is able to give his family a better quality of life. Thanks to his good products and the good service that he offers, he has a large clientele which allows him to have a very good level of sales.

With the thought of generating more income and being able to offer his customers a greater variety of products, Abdullah wants to increase the stock of products that he has. However, he does not have enough capital to be able to buy the products from his providers. He therefore requested a loan of 120,000 YER from AMB that will give him the opportunity to buy food staples in order to stock his store and offer his customers a greater variety. He hopes that with the loan he will be able to increase his sales because he will be offering his customers more products. 

In the future, Abdullah dreams of his business growing and being able to set up a supermarket so that his children can enjoy financial stability. He hopes to be able to give his family a better quality of life and greater possibilities for progress.

loans.use: to stock his store and offer his customers a greater variety

loans.name: Jameel

texts.en:
Jameel is 31 years old, married, and the father of two children who are currently in school. He lives in Sana`a, Yemen. His education background is "Diploma". After school, he looked for a job but unfortunately, he didn`t find one. So, he has worked very hard for many years to get his family ahead and give them everything they deserve. He has a grocery store which is his main source of income.

Jameel started his business with limited capital that he had operated well. Then, he developed his business to a grocery. His business is located in a very strategic area. Many people prefer his store because he always has the basic stables at affordable prices, and he provides the best possible customer service. His dream is to see his store flourish.

 Due to the current bad situation in Yemen, he has less profit from his enterprise. So, he took a loan of 100,000 YER from AMB to stock his business with more products so that his customers will always find what they need and keep coming back.

His goal for the future is for his business to grow and to have more customer demand. He will then get more income, which will help meet the basic needs of his household.

loans.use: to stock his business with more products so that his customers will always find what they need and keep coming back.

loans.name: Erlinda

texts.en:
Erlinda has owned and managed her rice farming business for almost sixteen years. She is happily married and has six children. She is glad because her husband is supportive in the maintenance of their rice field.

Erlinda would like to request a loan in the amount of 30,000 PHP due to the financial difficulty they are experiencing nowadays. She will be using her requested loan to buy farming supplies to improve the growth of her rice crop. Through applying complete farming supplies, she could have a plentiful harvest this coming crop season. Erlinda hopes that her dreams will be attained in order to sustain her family's needs and educate all of her children.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies for her rice farming business.

loans.name: Jose Carlos

texts.es:
José, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para el arrendamiento de tierras para el cultivo de maíz y frijol, con este dinero del préstamo estará asegurando la nueva siembra para mantenerse en la agricultura.
Él se considera que ha progresado, manteniéndose junto a su familia, proveyendo lo necesario para la producción.
texts.en: José is requesting a new loan to lease land for growing corn and beans.  With the funds from this loan, he will be assuring the planting of the new crop so that he stays in agriculture.  He feels that he has made progress – remaining with his family and providing what is needed for production.

loans.use: to lease land.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Roselyn

texts.en:
Roselyn is 33 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has seven children. 

Roselyn has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for ten years. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Roselyn is a new member of HSPFI.  In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for resale.

loans.name: Josefina

texts.en:
Josefina is 54 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married and has four children. 

Josefina has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks, and beverages. She has had this business for ten years. She requested a loan of PHP 5,000 to buy stocks of canned goods, snacks, and beverages.

Josefina is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, she hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks, and beverages for resale.

loans.name: Juan Jose

texts.es:
Juan, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo ya que considera que con estos préstamos ha logrado mejorar, en esta ocasión solicita para el pago de mozos para la recolección de la cosecha de maíz,esta es su segunda cosecha, que logra sacar a traves de financiamiento, esto le ayudara para hacer llegar la producción hasta su vivienda.
El considera que el préstamo le ayuda para obtener lo necesario y poder desarrollar su actividad agricola.
texts.en:
Juan has decided to get a new loan because he thinks he has been able to improve with these loans.  Now he is requesting a loan to pay the employees to harvest the corn crop.  This is the second harvest that he has done through a loan.  This will help him make the production be enough for his home.

He considers that the loan helps him get what he needs to be able to develop his agricultural business.

loans.use: to pay employees to harvest the corn crop.

loans.name: Marife

texts.en:
Marife's main sources of income are raising hogs and her home-based variety store. She is 26 years of age and a single parent with one child. She is currently living with her parents and child at the local community of Villa Beltran Ramon.

Marife works hard to sustain her child's needs. According to her, being a single parent is quite difficult because you have to act as the father and mother. Despite her situation, Marife is grateful because she is able to sustain her child's needs through the income she generates from her variety store and hog-raising business. 

Marife would like to improve her business and make it more productive, but the income she generates is not enough for their daily needs due to the high cost of basic commodities and her child's expenses. Regarding her aim in life, she is asking for additional capital in the amount of 15,000 PHP. She hopes to obtain the loan to be able to make her business continually grow. In this way, she could support her child's education and maintain her hog-raising business.

loans.use: to buy feed and vaccines for her hogs.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita has been involved in the livestock business for almost ten years. She is able to earn about 1,500 PHP per hog. She is raising four fattening hogs, and she hopes that she will be able to feed them well until they reach their their optimal size so that she can offer them for a greater price. Rosita knows that she can sustain her family's needs through her hog-raising business. 

Rosita is married with four children. Three of them are studying, and the other one is still an infant. Rosita and her husband work together to increase their profit because their children are growing and their children's school expenses are increasing. So, she and her husband are looking forward to improving their family's financial stability. Rosita said that “patience and management of time” are the characteristics that push her to strive for her best.

Rosita would like to ask for a loan in the amount of 15,000 PHP to buy feed for her hogs. This would really help her business grow, and she could improve her family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy feed for her hogs.

loans.name: Graciela

texts.es: Graciela, de 42 años, es una mujer alegre y trabajadora, vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo Jorge, de 40 años y sus 03 queridos hijos a quienes brinda una buena estadía. Graciela, se dedica a la venta de abarrotes como; arroz azúcar, fideos, conservas, gaseosas, entre otros. Hace 07 años comenzó esta actividad y comenta que le va muy bien. Los vecinos cercanos a la tienda de Graciela son los principales clientes que acuden cada día, ya que tiene la mejor variedad de productos que ofrecer. Desde que empezó a sacar prestamos de MFP, cuenta que le va mucho mejor que antes ya que de esa manera puede surtir aun mas en su tienda. Hasta ahora cuenta con el apoyo de los financistas y se siente orgullosa de trabajar con MFP; ya que de esa forma puede cumplir con sus planes de trabajo. Este será su crédito número 07 con MFP, está dispuesta a seguir cumpliendo con las cuotas de pago, para que en otra oportunidad acceda a otro préstamo. En su banco comunal forma de de la junta directiva y es muy responsable. Con los 2,500 nuevos soles, comprará productos de abarrotes para incrementar en su tienda.
texts.en: Graciela, 42, is a happy and hardworking woman.  She lives in her own house, along with her husband Jorge, 40, and their 3 beloved children, to whom they want to provide a good education.  Graciela has a business selling groceries such as: rice, sugar, noodles, preserves, soft drinks, and other products.  She started this business 7 years ago, and she tells us that it is going very well.  Graciela's main customers are the neighbors who live close to the store, and they come to her store every day because she has the best variety of products to offer.  She says that since she started taking loans from MFP, the business is going much better than before, because she has been able to carry even more products in her store.  Up to this point, she has been able to rely on the support of the lenders, and she feels proud to be working with MFP, because in this way she has been able to carry out her plans for her business.  This will be her 7th loan with MFP, and she is prepared to continue to comply with the payment terms on her loan, so that she will get another opportunity to borrow in the future.  She is on the board of directors of her communal bank, and is very responsible.  With the 2,500 Peruvian soles she requests, she will buy grocery products for her store.

loans.use: to buy more products to stock up her grocery store

loans.name: Francis Antonio

texts.es:
Francis, se ha decidido a solicitar un nuevo préstamo, porque quiere hacer una compra de repuestos para motocicleta, este préstamo le ayudara para mantener repuestos para realizar los trabajos de los clientes.
El préstamo anterior le permitió mejorar en su negocio y tener los materiales para trabajar, su condición económica ahora es mejor a la de antes.
texts.en:
Francis has decided to request a new loan because he wants to purchase replacement parts for motorcycles. This loan will help him stay in stock with parts for repairing his customers' vehicles. 

The previous loan allowed him to improve his business and have materials for working. His financial condition is better now than before.

loans.use: to purchase spare parts for his motorcycle shop.

loans.name: Salvador

texts.es:
Salvador, está iniciando su labor agrícola, por eso está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para arrendar el terreno donde cultivara la nueva siembra de maíz y frijol, con esta ayuda estará mejorando la condición de agricultor para poder asegurar la cosecha.
Él  manifiesta que la compra que realizo con el préstamo anterior, le ayudo a realizar una siembra exitosa con buenos frutos.
texts.en:
Salvador is beginning his farming work. That's why he is applying for a new loan for renting a piece of land where he will grow the new crop of corn and beans. 

With this assistance, he will be improving his farming situation, in order to ensure his harvest.  He states that the purchase he made with the previous loan helped him carry out a successful planting with good results.

loans.use: To  pay rent on a piece of farmland.

loans.name: Ines Cordero

texts.es:
Inés, quiere seguir trabajando con la institución, porque considera que estos préstamos le ayudan para continuar mejorando el negocio, en esta ocasión comprara azúcar, frijoles, arroz, café, para el negocio, invirtiendo solo en granos básicos.
Él manifiesta hacer tenido un efecto positivo de la utilización del préstamo anterior, ayudándole a crecer y a que su familia tambien mejore, este es su tercer prestamo.
texts.en:
Inés wants to continue working with the institution because he considers that these loans help him continue improving his business.  This time he will buy sugar, beans, rice, and coffee for the business, investing only in basic household necessities.

He says he had a positive effect from using the previous loan, helping him to grow and also helping his family to improve.  This is his third loan.

loans.use: to buy sugar, beans, rice, and coffee.

loans.name: Ana Ysabel

texts.es:
La señora Ana es una mujer que diariamente se enfrenta a muchos desafíos, pero con el paso del tiempo ha aprendido muy bien a poder afrontarlos y salir adelante sola, desde hace mucho deseaba independizarse y lograr cosas por sí sola y fue así como decidió poner un negocio donde se dedicaría a la venta de productos naturistas, en Perú estos productos son muchos usados por los peruanos, debido a que las plantas que se cosechan pueden brindar remedios naturales. Es principalmente en la sierra donde se consiguen estos productos debido a que en las ciudades más alejadas recurren a este tipo de remedios naturales, los cuales no solo son muy beneficiosos si no que pueden permitirles curarse de una manera mucho más natural.

Actualmente Ana trabaja a partir de las 9 de la mañana hasta las 6 de la tarde, tiempo en el que atienden en promedio a 10 clientes. Ella piensa y considera que su negocio está resultando debido a la actitud positiva que siempre demuestra y desde luego el buen trato al cliente que les brinda.Ella desea que los prestatarios Kiva puedan ayudarla y así ella pueda adquirir productos para escolares, los mismos que serán fuente de energía para los niños tales como la Maca, entre otros.

Su sueño consiste en fidelizar a sus clientes con la calidad de producto que les vende y con ello lograr convertirse en una distribuidora donde podrá hacer contactos y desde luego mejorar sus ventas.
texts.en:
Ana is a woman who faces a lot of challenges each day, but over time has learned how to confront them and get ahead on her own.  For a long time, she wanted to become independent and achieve things on her own, and so because of this she decided to establish a business where she would sell natural products.  These products are used a lot by Peruvians, because many plants that are grown in Peru are used to make natural medicines.  She gets these products mainly in the mountains, because these types of natural remedies are used a lot in the more remote cities, where they are not only very beneficial, but allow one to become cured in a much more natural way.

Now Ana is working from 9 in the morning until 6 in the evening, and during this time she can tend to, on average, about 10 customers.  She thinks and believes that her business is working because of the positive attitude that she demonstrates and, of course, the good service that she provides her customers.  Ana wants the Kiva lenders to help her so that she can buy products for schoolchildren such as maca root, which is an energy-imbuing food that is consumed by children, and other products.

Ana's dream is to create a loyal customer base with the quality of the products she sells, so that she could become a distributor where she would be able to make contacts and consequently increase her sales.

loans.use: to purchase more natural products to sell

loans.name: Angela Maria

texts.es: Angela de 25 años de edad vive en la ciudad de Cartagena,  con su cónyuge y su hijo de un año de edad. Ella posee un negocio de confecciones y manualidades, que elabora con sus propias manos: muñecas de trapo, portarretratos  y otros artículos en los que emplea el  arte country, técnica que aprendió de su madre, quien tiene un negocio con estas mismas especificaciones. Su meta es ampliar su estructura de negocio, confeccionar ropa y convertirse en una diseñadora famosa, pero su mayor desafío es la falta de capital de trabajo para lograrlo, pues con su creciente clientela se torna insuficiente para invertir y aumentar sus ganancias. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará materias primas para su negocio, inversión que planea será exitosa, porque comprará en mayor volumen y podrá responder a su extendida clientela mas oportunamente. En su negocio maneja una rentabilidad promedia del 49,6% , desde la cual planea su  gradual crecimiento empresarial.
texts.en:
Angela, 25, lives in the city of Cartagena with her spouse and one-year-old son. She has a business making crafts and handiwork she makes with her own hands: rag dolls, picture frames and other items for which she employs the use of "country" style, a technique she learned from her mother who has a business with these same characteristics. Her goal is to expand the structure of her business, making clothing and becoming a famous designer, but her greatest challenge is the lack of capital for achieving it since, with her growing clientele, money runs short for investing and increasing her earnings. 

Thus she turns to her Kiva loan, her first financing with the Mario Santo Domingo Foundation, with which she will purchase basic materials for her business. She expects the investment will be successful because she will buy in greater quantities and be able to respond to her expanded customer base more promptly. In her business she yields an average profitability of 49.6%, from which she plans her gradual growth in her business.

loans.use: to buy basic materials in larger quantities, such as cloth, yarn, thread, etc.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.es: Nelly tiene 40 años, dedicada con mucho amor a su esposo Marcelino de 54 años y sus 06 hijos, viven en su propia casa ubicada en la comunidad de Palmapampa. Nelly, es una mujer muy laboriosa su principal actividad es la siembra y cosecha de las plantas de cacao. Sus productos son vendidos a los centros de acopio de su localidad. Hace 20 años que empezó en esta labor y se siente contenta por realizar algo que a ella le gusta; lo mas difícil es tener que llevar sus productos desde la chacra hasta el lugar donde lo comercializa, pero con la ayuda de su esposo logran sobrellevar las dificultades. Con el tiempo anhelan comprar un moto carguero, pero ahora su prioridad  es obtener buena producción para hacer realidad los sueños de Nelly  y su familia. Este será su crédito número 07 con MFP y promete ser puntual con su cuota se pago para que después pueda acceder a otro. En su banco comunal es una socia muy dócil y responsable. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, comprará plantas de cacao para incrementar en sus tierras de producción.
texts.en:
Nelly is 40, and devotes herself with much love to her husband Marcelino, who is 54, and to their six children. They live in their own house located in the community of Palmapampa. Nelly is a very hard-working woman, whose main livelihood is growing and harvesting cacao.

Her products are sold in the local collection centers. She started in this work 20 years ago, and feels happy doing something that she likes. The hardest part is having to take her products from her small farm to the place where she sells them. But with her husband's help, she is managing to overcome these difficulties. 

Her greatest wish is to buy a cargo motorcycle someday, but now Nelly's priority is to get good production, so that she can make her and her family's dreams a reality.

This will be her seventh loan with MFP, and she promises to make her installment payments on time, so that she can access another loan later.  She is a very mild-mannered and responsible member of her communal bank.

With the 2,000 nuevos soles, she will buy cacao plants for increasing production on her crop land.

loans.use: To buy more cacao plants.

loans.name: Rosa Areli

texts.es:
Rosa, está solicitando nuevamente préstamo, porque ha decidido comprar productos para el negocio, compra medicinas vitaminas, analgésicos, para fortalecer el negocio. Con esto ofrecerá mayor diversidad para que sus clientes permanezcan la preferencia.
La inversión anterior le permitió crecer y variar el negocio,  satisfaciendo la demanda de los clientes, además ofreció más comodidad en su familia en lo que respecta al dinero.
texts.en:
Rosa is once again requesting a loan because she has decided to purchase products for her business. She will purchase medicines, vitamins and analgesics to build up the business. Thus she will offer a greater diversity so her customers may remain loyal. 

The previous loan allowed her to grow and vary the business, satisfying her customers' demand, and additionally, offered more comfort to her family in terms of money.

loans.use: to purchase medicines, vitamins and analgesics.

loans.name: Artyom

texts.en: Artyom is 31 years old. He lives with his wife, child, and brother's family. He is involved in farming and has applied for a loan to develop his farm. With the requested loan, Artyom plans to purchase and breed cattle. He will also purchase forage for the cattle and fertilizer for the land. This loan will help Artyom to increase his income from agriculture and insure improved living conditions for his family.

loans.use: to pay for cattle, forage, and fertilizer

loans.name: Ana Delmis Yamileth

texts.es:
Ana, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para continuar trabajando y tener abastecido de cerdos la granja, por eso en esta ocasión comprara dos cerdos y concentrado para alimentarlos, ya que esto le permite a ella mantener en la granja lo necesario.
Considera que el préstamo anterior le permitió crecer en la granja teniendo cerdos para comercializarlos.
texts.en: Ana is requesting a new loan in order to continue working and have pigs to supply the farm.  For this reason, she will now purchase two pigs and concentrated animal feed to feed them, since this allows her to maintain her farm with what's necessary.  She considers that the previous loan allowed her to grow her farm, raising pigs to sell.

loans.use: to purchase two pigs and pig feed.

location.town: San Rafael de Oriente, San Miguel

loans.name: Crisanta

texts.es: Crisanta de 43 años de edad, es madre soltera con 5 hijos. Juntos viven en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Pichari. Crisanta es una madre entusiasta y trabajadora, ella se dedica al cultivo de cacao desde muy pequeña, esta labor lo aprendió de sus padres quienes siempre trabajaron en el campo. Ella también cuenta con un pequeño negocio de compra y venta de productos como el cacao café y otros, es así que trata de ganarse la vida por ofrecerle un bienestar a su querida familia. Los productos que acopia juntamente con sus cosechas lo traslada a la ciudad de ayacucho donde le pagan buen precio. Mas adelante Crisanta esta pensando seguir cultivando cacao, pero su mayor anhelo es el de crecer como acopiador ya que estos productos tienen una mayor demanda en el mercado nacional e internacional. Este es su cuarto crédito con MFP, por lo que ella se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Ella esta agradecida a su banco comunal por que son solidarios. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles realizará el deshierbo de su parcela de cacao, para ello contratará peones.
texts.en:
Crisanta, 43, is a single mother with five children. Together they live in their own home located in the district of Pichari. Crisanta is an enthusiastic and hardworking mother. She has devoted herself to the cultivation of cocoa from a very early age. She learned this work from her parents who always worked in the fields. She also has a small business buying and selling products such as cocoa, coffee and other products. In this way she tries to earn a living in order to offer wellbeing to her dear family. The products she stores along with her harvests are transported to the city of Ayacucho where they pay her a good price. Further along Crisanta is thinking of continuing to grow cocoa, but her greatest wish is to grow as a warehouser since these products see greater demand in the national and international markets. 

This is her fourth loan with MFP and so she commits to paying off the loan on time. She is grateful to her communal bank because they are supportive. With the 3,000 Peruvian soles she will weed her field of cocoa, hiring day laborers to do the work.

loans.use: to hire day laborers.

loans.name: Teresia

texts.en:
Teresia owns a fruit parlor in Mombasa, Kenya. She saved money and opened the business in her house before opening a kiosk. She is married and has one child. The fruit parlor has been in operation for two years.

Teresia is applying for a loan of 20,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to purchase a fruit-processing machine. She will use the extra income to purchase additional stock and has also fixed her eyes on opening other types of businesses.

loans.use: To purchase a fruit-processing machine.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a resident of Mombasa, Kenya. He is married, has three children, and runs a retail shop which has been in operation for the last two years. He was introduced to Milango by his friends.

Ali is applying for a loan of 70,000 Kenyan shillings (KES) to purchase more retail stock, such as maize flour and soap. His challenge is the high cost of commodities and inflation. His future ambition is to open a wholesale business. He will save the extra income from this loan for emergency needs.

loans.use: To purchase more retail stock, such as maize flour and soap.

loans.name: Sarmen

texts.en: Sarmen is 28 years old, lives in the village of Yelpin with his father and brother, and breeds cattle with the assistance of family members. Sarmen's farm currently includes six cows and five sheep, and he would like to increase the number of cattle and develop his farm. The requested loan to purchase two more cows will allow Sarmen to earn more income and invest in the further development of his farm.

loans.use: to purchase more cows.

location.town: Yelpin village of Vayots Dzor region

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es: Wilfredo es un emprendedor que se dedica a brindar los servicios de soldadura este servicio lo realiza de forma ambulante ya que sus clientes lo llaman para que les brinde su servicio de soldadura, él tiene sus clientes que lo visitan frecuentemente y otros eventuales. Esta actividad que desempeña el emprendedor nos expresa que la aprendió de forma empírica ya que tenía que aportar a su familia  y cubrir algunos gastos, pero él se siente muy feliz con su negocio. El emprendedor está solicitando nuevamente crédito ya que no es la primera vez que solicita financiamiento en el anterior crédito demostró ser una persona responsable y con buen record crediticio y lo mejor que invirtió en su negocio además es una persona  perseverante, ahora nuevamente solicita para comprar hierro, varillas, guantes, herramientas entre otros materiales para la soldauras.
texts.en:
Wilfredo is an entrepreneur who offers welding services. He offers these services as a street vendor, as his customers call him to do welding for them. He also has customers who visit him frequently, and he does other casual jobs. 

He states that the work he does as an entrepreneur is self-taught, as he had to contribute to his family and cover some expenses. But he feels very happy with his business. 

The entrepreneur is applying again for credit, as this isn't the first time he has applied for a loan. With the previous loan, she showed himself to be a responsible person with a good credit. The best thing is that he invested in his business, and is also a persevering person. 

Now he is applying again, in order to buy steel, reinforcing rods, gloves, tools, and other materials for welding.

loans.use: To buy steel, reinforcing rods, gloves, tools, and other materials.

loans.name: Ana Lucila

texts.es:
Ana, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, porque ha recibido un buen trato y por eso considera que puede seguir trabajando con la institución, ella comprara ropa para ambos sexos como blusas, faldas, pantalones, ropa interior, esta compra le ayudara para tener variedad de prendas en su negocio.
Ella comenta que el préstamo anterior le permitió tener nuevos productos para ofrecer, y que esto le ocasiono mayores ventas, dándole mejor estabilidad a su familia.
texts.en:
Ana is asking for a new loan because she has received a good agreement and therefore she believes that she can continue working with the institution. 

She will buy clothing for both sexes such as shirts, skirts, pants, and underwear. This purchase will help her to have a variety of clothing for her business.

She says that the previous loan permitted her to have new products to offer, and that this brought about better sales, giving great stability to her family.

loans.use: to buy blouses, skirts, pants and underwear

loans.name: Faustino

texts.es:
Faustino de 41 años de edad convive con Zenaida de 28 años, fruto de esta relación tienen 5 hijos, ellos viven en su casa propia ubicada en el distrito de Pichari. Faustino es un hombre dedicado a la agricultura él se dedica al cultivo de cacao y otros frutales como el plátano, naranja y piña. Cuenta que si uno no diversifica su producto solo tendría un ingreso y solo una vez al año, es por esta razón que él tiene una variedad de cultivos por los que obtiene buenos ingresos en cualquier época del año. Por ejemplo la palta, su fructificación es constante; mientras que el cacao solo da por temporadas y baja la producción lo mismo pasa con la piña y los cítricos.
Faustino está contento con todo lo que hasta ahora ha logrado gracias al préstamo de MFP, que es la institución que mas facilidades les brinda. En un futuro Faustino esta pensando incrementar mas cultivos de cacao ya que aun tiene terrenos por cultivar. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que Faustino se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Él esta contento con su banco comunal por que todos son democráticos. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles realizará la compra de abono y contratar peones para sacar la maleza de su campo agrícola
texts.en:
Faustino, age 41, lives together with Zenaida, age 28, and through their relationship, they have five children.  They live in their own home, located in the district of Pichari.  Faustino is a man dedicated to farming.  He works cultivating cocoa beans and other fruits such as plantains, oranges, and pineapple.  He tells us that if one doesn't diversify his products, he would only have one income and just once a year.  It is for this reason that he has a variety of cultivations, so that he obtains good income any time of the year.  For example, the avocado harvest is constant; however, the cocoa bean is only harvested in season and the production is the same for pineapples and the citrus fruits.

Faustino is happy with all that he has achieved so far thanks to the loan from MFP, which is the organization that offers the most services.  In the future, Faustino is thinking of increasing his cocoa bean cultivations, since he still has land to cultivate.  This is his second loan with MFP, for which Faustino promises to make his payments on time.  He is happy with his communal bank because all are democratic.  With the 3,000 nuevos soles, he will purchase fertilizer and hire laborers to pull the weeds from his fields.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and to hire laborers.

loans.name: Eladio Maximo

texts.es:
Eladio es un hombre de 52 años que supo salir adelante solo con su hija, él y ella son personas muy honradas y estas siempre pensando en la manera de continuar progresando, su hija Noemi es su fiel acompañante, siempre han estado juntos y han buscado la manera de ganar algo de dinero para poder comer lo necesario.

Con tantos años juntos, ellos han aprendido mucho sobre el manejo de los negocios, actualmente Eladio se dedica a la venta de Bebidas, junto a su hija, a partir de las 9 de la mañana hasta las 11 de la noche, tiempo en el que luchan muchísimo y se dedican a su negocio. Para poder tener mayores ingresos, Eladio se dedica a la venta de frutas de estación, su hija ha aprendido mucho de su esfuerzo y ganas de progresar, es por este motivo que esta joven muchacha de 18 años se dedica también a la venta de cosméticos.

En estos momentos esta pequeña e inspiradora familia necesitan que los prestatarios Kiva puedan ayudarlos y así ellos puedan comprar más bebidas para vender, ellos saben que esto implicará progreso debido a que piensan que su negocio tiene éxito debido a la buena atención al cliente y el entusiasmo que demuestran en cada venta.
Eladio sueña con poder convertir a su hija en toda una profesional y así pueda aprender a salir adelante por sí sola.
texts.en:
Eladio is a 52-year old man who has learned how to get ahead alone with his daughter. They are very honorable people and are always thinking of a way of continuing to progress. His daughter Noemi is his loyal companion; they are always together and have been searching for a way to earn enough money to have the food they need.

After so many years together, Eladio and Noemi have learned much concerning managing a business. At present, Eladio is selling drinks, together with his daughter, from 9:00 am until 11:00 at night, during which time they struggle hard, dedicating themselves to their business. To be able to have more income, Eladio also sells seasonal fruit. His daughter has learned much from her efforts and desire to progress. That is why this young girl of 18 also sells cosmetics.

In these moments, this small and inspiring family needs help from Kiva investors to buy more drinks to sell. They understand that this means progress since their business has succeeded due to their good customer service and the enthusiasm they demonstrate with each sale.

loans.use: to buy all kinds of drinks to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to purchase fertilizer and herbicides.

loans.name: Ernesto

texts.es:
Ernesto, es peluquero y trabaja en un salón de peinados donde realiza todo tipo de cortes de cabello en general.
El crédito lo requiere para la construcción de un muro exterior en su casa para dar más seguridad a su familia.
Ernesto es soltero, no tiene hijos y vive en la casa de sus padres en la zona Illampu de la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y KIVA.
texts.en:
Ernesto is a hair dresser.  He works in a hairstyling salon where he does all types of haircuts in general.

He needs the loan to build an exterior wall to his house in order to give his family more security.

Ernesto is single, and he does not have children.  He lives in his parents’ house in the Illampu area of the city of La Paz.

This is his first time that he has worked with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to build an exterior wall to his house in order to give his family more security.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es: María de 31 años de edad, convive con Percy de 34 años fruto de esta relación tienen 2 hijos ellos viven en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito  de Pichari. María se dedica a la venta de bebidas, ella prepara refrescos a base de frutas es casi  que es la única quien expende este tipo de bebidas. Usualmente trabaja con el apoyo de su esposo. Cuenta que antes de dedicarse a este negocio vendía licores pues lo dejó por que había personas que le faltaban el respeto, fue todo esto que influyo para que María tomara la decisión y cambiarse de giro a su negocio. María esta tan contenta con este negocio ya que le genera un buen ingreso gracias a la buena elaboración y a la limpieza que tiene y el lugar estratégico donde se encuentra. En un futuro está pensando abrir una fuente de soda con la finalidad de mejorar su nivel económico ya que vio una buena oportunidad y una buena cantidad de clientes. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. María es la tesorera en su banco comunal por lo que ella agradece la confianza. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles invertirá en mejorar su local de venta.
texts.en:
María is 31 years old. She lives with Percy who is 34 years old and they have two children. They live in their own house located in the district of Pichari. María works selling drinks. She prepares fruit drinks and is almost the only one who sells this type of drinks.

Usually she works with the help of her husband. Before she worked in this business she sold alcoholic beverages but left it because she had customers lacking in respect, and it was all this that influenced María to take the decision to make a change in her business.

María is so happy with this business because it generates a good income thanks to good preparation, cleanliness, and the strategic place where it is located. 

In the future she is thinking of opening a soda fountain with the idea of bettering her economical status as she sees it as a good opportunity to gain a good number of clients. 

This is her second loan through MFP and she promises to make her payments on time. María is the treasurer of the community bank and she is grateful for the trust. With the 3,000 soles she will invest in improving her business facility.

loans.use: to buy materials to refurbish her business facility

loans.name: Sandra

texts.es:
Sandra trabaja como empleada en una entidad pública de la ciudad de La Paz.
El crédito lo requiere para pagar la matricula de la universidad y terminar sus estudios y de esta forma tener mas ingresos para ayudar a su familia.
Ella es casada, tiene dos hijos y vive en la casa de sus padres en la zona de Sopocachi de la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y la primera vez junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Sandra is employed by a public entity in the city of La Paz.

She needs the loan to pay registration fees at the university and to finish her studies.  This way she will have more income to help her family.

She is married and has two children.  She lives in her parents’ house in the Sopocachi area of the city of La Paz.

This is the first time she has worked with IMPRO and the first time she has worked with Kiva.

loans.use: to pay registration fees at the university in order to continue her university studies.

loans.name: Israel

texts.es:
Israel, trabaja como metereologo en una entidad publica donde gana un sueldo mínimo con el cual mantiene a sus padres.
El crédito lo requiere para la refacción de su habitación en la casa de sus padres.
El es soltero, no tiene hijos y vive en la casa de sus padres en la zona de Alto Tembladerani ubicada en la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y junto a KIVA.
texts.en:
Israel works as a meteorologist for a private entity.  He earns a minimum salary, which he uses to support his parents.

He needs the loan to repair his room in his parents’ house.

He is single and does not have children.  He lives in his parents’ house in the Alto Tembladerani area in the city of La Paz.

This is the first time he has worked with IMPRO and Kiva.

loans.use: to repair his room in his parents’ house.

loans.name: Diane

texts.es:
Diane, es empleado y trabaja como auxiliar  en una entidad publica de la ciudad de La Paz. También  realiza trabajos de zapatería en su tiempo libre.  
El crédito lo necesita para compra de materia prima para su zapatería como por ejemplo cueros, pegamento, plantiíllas,  hebillas etc. de esta forme mejorar sus ingresos para mantener a su familia.
Diane es casado tiene tres hijos y vive en la casa de sus suegros en la zona de San Pedro ubicada en la ciudad de La Paz.
Es la primera vez que trabaja con IMPRO y la primera vez con KIVA.
texts.en:
Diane is employed by a public entity in La Paz, and he works as an assistant.  He works as a shoemaker in his free time.

He needs the loan to buy raw material for his shoe business.  He will buy things like leather, glue, insoles, and buckles, etc.  This way he will improve his income in order to support his family.

Diane is married and has three children.  He lives in his mother and father-in-law’s house in the San Pedro area of the city of La Paz.

It is the first time he has worked with IMPRO and the first time he has worked with Kiva.

loans.use: to buy leather, glue, insoles, buckles, and other items for his business of making shoes by order.

loans.name: Maria Cristina

texts.es:
María, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, ya que quiere reparar el coche en el cual se desplaza con la venta de hot dog, este financiamiento le ayudara para que pueda mantener en buenas condiciones esta herramienta tan fundamental para su negocio.
Ella considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo para mejorar, que hasta el momento no ha tenido problemas y con su familia se mantiene siempre unida.
texts.en:
Maria is applying for a new loan, since she wants to repair the car in which she travels to sell hot dogs. This loan will help her so that she can maintain this fundamental tool in good condition for her business.

She feels that her past loan helped her improve and that up until now she has not had any problems and she always remains united with her family.

loans.use: to repair the car from which she makes sales.

loans.name: Jorge Boanerges

texts.es:
Jorge, está solicitando nuevamente un préstamo para la compra de madera y una moto sierra, para utilizarla en el taller de carpintería, este nuevo préstamo le ayudara para mantenerse brindando un buen servicio a los clientes.
La aspiración de Jorge es con la continuidad de estos préstamos, mejorar su taller, dándole más fuerza y crecimiento.
texts.en:
Jorge is asking for another loan for the purchase of wood and a chainsaw to use in his carpentry shop. This new loan will help him continue to give his customers good service. 

Jorge's dream is to improve his shop with continued loans, allowing him to grow and strengthen.

loans.use: to purchase wood and a chainsaw.

loans.name: Retroceder Nunca Rendirse Jamas - El Tambo Group

texts.es:
El Señora SONIA GLADYS 45 años de edad estado civil soltera, con 01 hija menor de edad. Es socio de la  alcancía comunal “RETROCEDER NUNCA RENDIRSE JAMAS – EL TAMBO”.
Ella actualmente se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir en el mercado de su localidad vende polos, camisas, pantalones, zapatos, etc. El préstamo solicito para la adquisición de prendas de vestir. Dándose la  oportunidad en el negocio para mejorar sus ingresos económicos.
Desea en el futuro que su hija termine los estudios secundarios y comprarse su automóvil para el traslado de sus mercaderías. En la fotografía está ubicada al centro de grupo se encuentra  viste con polo color plomo y casaca color negro.
texts.en:
Señora Sonia Gladys is 45 years old, is single, and has a daughter who is a minor. She is a member of the communal bank "Retrodecer Nunca Rendirse Jamas -- El Tambo" (Never Go Back, Never Give Up -- El Tambo).

At the present time she sells articles of clothing in the market in her area. She sells polo shirts, shirts, pants, shoes, etc. She applied for the loan to acquire articles of clothing, giving her the opportunity to improve her income from her business.  

In the future she wants her daughter to finish her secondary schooling and to buy herself a car to transport her merchandise. In the photograph she is located in the center of the group, wearing a gray polo shirt and a black jacket.

loans.use: to buy articles of clothing to sell

loans.name: Manuel Antonio

texts.es:
Manuel, quiere aumentar el inventario de su negocio, por eso está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, que le permita mantener surtido de productos medicinales, según la necesidad de sus clientes, este préstamo será para comprar vitaminas, productos medicinales, reanimantes, suplementos alimenticios, entre otros.
Él considera que estos préstamos le han mejorado su capacidad, para el servicio de los clientes.
texts.en:
Manuel would like to increase the inventory of his company, which is why he is asking for a new loan. It will help him stay stocked up on medical items, according to his customers' needs. This loan will be for the purchase of vitamins, medical items, rejuvenators, and health supplements, among other things. 

He thinks that these loans have improved his ability to serve his customers.

loans.use: to purchase vitamins, medical items, rejuvenators, and health supplements.

loans.name: Idalia Del Carmen

texts.es:
Idalia, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo para la compra de productos de la canasta básica, ya que quiere fortalecer en leche en polvo, café, refrescos, arroz, aceite, embutidos, con el fin de mantener variedad y poder abastecer la demanda.
Ella manifiesta que después de su primer préstamo, el negocio ha ido creciendo, teniendo en la actualidad más capacidad y proveyéndole mejores ganancias.
texts.en:
Idalia is applying for a new loan to purchase basic consumer products, since she wants to strengthen her stock of powdered milk, coffee, soft drinks, rice, oil, and sausages, with the goal of maintaining variety and being able to satisfy demand.

She states that since her first loan, her business has been growing, now having greater capacity and providing her with better earnings.

loans.use: to buy powdered milk, coffee, soft drinks, rice, oil, and sausages

loans.name: Mariya

texts.ru:
Мария – замужем, у нее двое детей. Ее семья проживает в городе Хуст. Мария – на пенсии. Однако она очень деятельная и не может просто сидеть дома, ничего не делая. Поэтому Мария решила подрабатывать и шить дома пуховые одеяла на заказ. Используя материал заказчика, Мария предоставляет клиенту качественный товар, сшитый на совесть. Этим она занимается уже не первый год. За счет этой подработки получает дополнительный доход в размере 1 500 гривен, к своей пенсии в 843 гривны. 

Сын Марии собирается скоро жениться. Мария – очень заботливая мать. Она заранее стала думать о том, где будет жить молодая семья. Поэтому Мария обратилась за кредитом в КИВА для того, чтобы сделать ремонт дома, куда переедут молодожены, чтобы все подготовить к их совместной жизни после свадьбы.  
Пометка: история на русском языке
texts.en:
Mariya is married and has two children.  Her family lives in the city of Khoost.  Mariya is retired, but she is very active and can't just sit around the house doing nothing.  Because of this, Mariya decided to earn extra money at home by making duvets to order.  Using material brought by her clients, Mariya provides them with high quality, well made duvets.  This isn't the first year Mariya has been doing this and with this side work, she earns 1,500 hryven (UAH) in supplement to her pension of 843 hryvni. 

Mariya's son is getting ready to be married.  Mariya is a very caring mother and she started to think ahead about where the young couple will live.  For this reason, Mariya applied for a loan through Kiva to remodel her home, where the newlyweds will live, and to get everything ready for their new life together. 

Note: story in Russian

loans.use: to remodel her home, where her son and his bride will live after their wedding

loans.name: Olga

texts.es: Olga, de 66 años de edad, está casado con Filomeno de 62 años, fruto de esta relación tienen 4 hijos con los que vive en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Pichari. Olga es una madre con 4 hijos que día a día se esfuerza para que mas adelante sus hijos sean hombres de bien; ella se dedica al cultivo de cacao y plátano en su parcela ubicada por la comunidad de  san martín. En este trabajo ya lleva más de 25 años juntamente con su querido esposo, su fiel acompañante quien desde un inicio fue el gestor de todos sus cultivos. Ellos para lograr todo esto tuvieron que pasar muchas dificultades, una de ella fue el cambio del clima que perjudicaba las plantas, así como el robo de sus plantas de cacao. Pero aún así continuan con mucho ahínco hasta lograr lo que ahora tienen. Habitualmente trabaja junto con su esposo pero en temporadas de cosecha siempre requiere de peones para que le puedan facilitar en la extracción de sus frutos. Ella esta contenta con el trabajo que realiza y a la vez agradece a MFP, por la facilidad del crédito por que sin ello no habría logrado pagar al peón quienes  sembraron sus plantas que  ahora tiene. Es de esta manera que Olga trata de salir adelante por darles un bienestar a sus hijos. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete una vez más en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Ella está feliz con su banco comunal por que son solidarios. Con los 2,000 nuevos soles, realizará el deshierbo de sus cultivos de cacao, para ello contratará peones.
texts.en:
Olga, 66 years old, is married to Filomeno who is 62 years old, and they have 4 children living with them in their own house located in the district of Pichari. Olga is a mother with 4 children and day by day she puts forth effort in order for her sons to later become good men. She works growing cocoa and bananas in a plot located in the community of San Martín. She has been doing this work for more than 25 years together with her dear husband, her faithful companion who from the beginning was the manager of all the crops. 

In order to achieve all this they had to go through many difficulties. One of them was the changing weather that damaged the plants as well as the theft of their cocoa plants. But even so they continue with much eagerness to achieve what they now have.

She usually works together with her husband but during harvesting season they always need some laborers so they can help to harvest the crops. She is happy with the work she does and she is grateful to MFP, for the ease of getting credit because without it she could not have successfully paid the laborer who planted the plants that they have now.

This is the way that Olga tries to get ahead by supporting the wellbeing of her children. This is her second loan through MFP, and she promises once again to make her payments on time. She is happy with the communal bank because they are supportive. With the 2,000 soles, she will be able to weed the cocoa crops by contracting laborers.

loans.use: to contract laborers

loans.name: Vilma

texts.es: Vilma  de 43 años de edad vive en San Jacinto, municipio ubicado en el departamento de Bolívar, con sus 3 hijos en las edades de 11 a 21 años de edad; allí se dedica a la venta de queso y a la crianza de cerdos, que vende a clientes ubicados en su población. Su negocio de comercializar queso, lo inició cuando conoció,  como este negocio funcionaba en manos de un familiar,  quien compraba la leche para fabricar el queso. Vilma inició con unos pocos clientes y hoy provee a tiendas, graneros y a la comunidad en general, que también son sus clientes en el negocio de la crianza porcina. Su meta es hacer crecer su negocio y aumentar su capital de trabajo; esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará cerdos en pueblos vecinos,  que le ofrecen a un buen precio y queso para responder a su creciente clientela. En la actualidad su negocio maneja unos indicadores financieros de rentabilidad sobre las ventas no menor del 11% , y que con su inversión planea hacerlos crecer. Su sueño es lograr apoyar la educación profesional de sus 3 hijos, que hoy están en las edades de 11 a 21 años de edad, para que en el futuro sean profesionales exitosos útiles a la sociedad.
texts.en: Vilma, who is 43 years old, lives in San Jacinto, a town located in the department of Bolivar, with her three children, ages 11 to 21. There she sells cheese and raises pigs, which she sells to customers in her town. She began her business of selling cheese when she learned from a relative, who was buying milk to make cheese, how this business worked. Vilma began with a few customers and today supplies stores, granaries, and the community in general, who are also her customers for her pig-raising business. Her goal is to expand her business and increase her working capital. This is why she has turned to her Kiva loan, the first loan that she has obtained from Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she will buy pigs in neighboring towns, which offer her a good price, and cheese to respond to her growing clientele. At this time her business has financial indicators of returns on sales of no less than 11%, and with her investment she plans to make them grow. Her dream is to be able to support the professional education of her three children, who are now aged 11 to 21 years old, so that in the future they will be successful professionals who are useful to society.

loans.use: to buy pigs in neighboring towns, which offer her a good price, and cheese

loans.name: Orfilia De La Paz

texts.es:
Orfilia, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, ya que quiere realizar una compra de productos para el negocio, arroz, jabón, azúcar, aceite, embutidos, huevos, con el fin de fortalecer el negocio, surtiéndolo de productos que demandan los clientes.
El objetivo de Orfilia es permanecer en el negocio y manifiesta que el préstamo anterior le ayudo para mantenerse y seguir brindando un buen servicio.
texts.en:
Orfilia is applying for a new loan, as she wants to buy goods for her business: rice, soap, sugar, cooking oil, cold cuts, and eggs, with the aim of building up her business, by supplying it with the products her customers are asking for.

Orfilia's objective is to remain in business, and she states that the previous loan helped her to keep her business going, and continue providing good service.

loans.use: To buy rice, soap, sugar, cooking oil, cold cuts, and eggs.

loans.name: Las Novatas Group

texts.es:
El grupo las Novatas lo conforman tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Ligia de 45 años quien desde hace 8 años se dedica a la venta de ropa y comida la cual inicio con mil pesos. Ella está casada tiene 4 hijos de los cuales tres están a su cargo.
Su meta es incrementar su negocio lo cual ha logrado gracias a los créditos con la compra de mayor cantidad y variedad de productos.
Las otros integrantes son Sandra de los Ángeles quien vende comida desde hace 8 años y Adriana se dedica a la venta de productos Avon desde hace 2 años.

(La foto fue tomada mientras esperaban la capacitación de Educación Financiera la cual se esta impartiendo el en cada desemboloso)
texts.en:
The "Novatas" group is made up of three hard-working and enterprising people. One of them is Ligia, 45, who for eight years has been selling clothing and food, a business she started with 1,000 pesos.

She is married, and has four children; three of them in her care.

Her goal is to increase her business, which she has managed to do thanks to the loans, by buying a greater quantity and variety of goods.

The other members of the group are Sandra de los Ángeles, who has been selling food for eight years, and Adriana who has been selling Avon products for two years. 

(The photo was taken while they were waiting for the financial education training, which is provided at each disbursement.)

loans.use: Purchase merchandise and supplies for her business.

loans.name: Noe

texts.es:
Noé, se ha decidido por un nuevo préstamo para la compra de hierro, tubos, alicates, soldadores, para mejorar la instalación del negocio, reparándolo para que sea más seguro, con la ayuda de este préstamo lograra realizar este plan, que espera sea una buena inversión.
El considera haber mejorado, teniendo una buena experiencia con el préstamo que se le otorgo.
texts.en:
Noé has decided to apply for a new loan to purchase iron, metal pipes, pliers, and soldering irons to improve the set up of his business, repairing it so that it can be more secure. With the help of this loan, he will be able to carry out this plan, which he hopes will be a good investment.

He feels that he has improved, having had a good experience with the loan that was granted to him

loans.use: to buy iron, metal pipes, pliers, and soldering irons.

loans.name: Ana Mercedes

texts.es:
Ana, está solicitando un nuevo préstamo, para invertirlo en materiales agrícolas, con este dinero pagara el arrendamiento de la tierra para el cultivo y comprar cerdos para la granja, con esta inversión estará mejorando sus actividades, asegurándose del terreno para sembrar y la compra de los cerdos para aumenta la granja.
Ella ha tenido una buena experiencia con estos préstamos ya que le sirven para apoyar a su esposo contribuyendo con su familia.
texts.en:
Ana is asking for a new loan to invest in agricultural materials. With this money she will pay for the rent of cropland and buy pigs for the farm. With this investment, she will be improving her activities, ensuring the land for planting and buying pigs to grow the farm. 

She has had a good experience with these loans since they help her help her husband, contributing to the family.

loans.use: to pay for renting land and buying pigs.

loans.name: Yarnelis Rosa

texts.es: Yarnelis de 43 años de edad vive en San Jacinto tierra del tejido vertical, las hamacas y otras hermosas artesanías, elaboradas con las manos  de la mujer de esta región principalmente. Por esto no es raro que Yarnelis  tenga esta tradición y la aplique a un negocio,  mediante el cual genera ingresos para su hogar vendiendo artesanias como mochilas, sombreros, entre otras. Ella conoce que en cada época hay un producto estrella  y como se acercan los carnavales, desde ya, está trabajando en la exhibición de los famosos sombreros san- jacinteros, pero su capital de trabajo se torna insuficiente para responder a su plan de oferta. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su credikiva, octavo financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el que comprará sombreros,  que exhibirá en su negocio y que usualmente vende a buen precio en esta temporada, obteniendo importantes ganancias. Durante los 10 años de estarse beneficiando con financiamiento de esta organización ha logrado aumentar sus inventarios mejorar su local etc. Su meta más adelante es poner puertas corredizas a su negocio para mejorar su seguridad y lograr un ambiente mas confortable, que invite a sus clientes a la compra de sus productos.
texts.en: Yarnelis is 43 years old. She lives in San Jacinto, land of vertical weaving, hammocks and other beautiful artisanal crafts made by hand mainly by the women of this region. That is why it isn't unusual that Yarnelis follows this tradition and applies it to her business, with which she generates income for her home. She sells artisanal crafts such as backpacks and hats, among others. She knows that every season, there is a star product, and since carnival is approaching, she is working on the exhibition of the famous San Jacinteros hats. However, her working capital is insufficient for responding to her supply plan. That is the reason that she has turned to a Kiva loan, the eighth loan she has taken out with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo. With it, she will buy hats, which she will exhibit at her business, and which usually sell at a good price, obtaining good earnings. During the 10 years that she has been benefitting form loans from this organization, she has been able to increase her inventory, improve her locale, etc. Her goal for the future is to put sliding doors in her business to increase security and achieve a more comfortable environment that invites customers in to buy her products.

loans.use: to buy hats.

loans.name: Rosa Yasmin

texts.es:
Rosa, está solicitando un préstamo para la compra de cerdos, ya que quiere mejorar la granja agregándole más para tener una mejor disponibilidad, la intensión de ella es crecerlos, engordarlos y en su momento ponerlos a la venta.
Ella considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo para mantenerse en el negocio, mejorando las condiciones en su hogar.
texts.en:
Rosa is requesting a loan to buy pigs, because she wants to improve her farm by adding more animals.  This way, she will have more pigs available to sell.  Rosa intends to raise them, fatten them, and at the appropriate time, put them up for sale.

She thinks that her previous loan helped her to stay in business and improve the living conditions in her home.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Quiere Al Niño Group

texts.es: La Sra. Norma  es conviviente,  tiene 48 años de edad y tiene 6 hijos, actualmente es socia  en la alcancía comunal  “Quiere al Niño”  grupo  conformado por  7  socios que se dedican a diversas actividades de comercio. Norma  se dedica a la venta de plásticos al por mayor desde hace 10 años , esta mercadería está destinada para provincia, es decir vende plásticos a diferentes departamentos del Perú, Norma inicio este negocio con la idea de ofrecerle una estabilidad a su familia, gracias a su esfuerzo y dedicación a logrado mejores ingresos económicos sus hijos van a la escuela , ha construido su casa y se ha comprado un terreno, Norma  a solicitado un nuevo préstamo para comprar plásticos. Norma  cumplirá sus metas con mucho trabajo y esfuerzo y que los préstamos de Edaprospo le ayudaran.
texts.en:
Norma has a common-law relationship. She is 48 years old and has 6 children. Currently she is a member of the community bank “Quiere al Niño.” This group was formed by 7 members who work in various commercial activities. 

Norma has been working selling wholesale plastic products for 10 years. This merchandise is destined for the provinces, that is to say she sells plastics to the different departments of Peru.

Norma began this business with the idea of offering stability to her family. Thanks to her effort and dedication to have higher financial income her children go to school, they have built a house, and they have bought some land. Norma is asking for a new loan in order to buy plastic products. Norma will accomplish her goals with much work and effort and the loans from Edaprospo will help her.

loans.use: to buy plastic products

loans.name: Andrea

texts.es: Andrea de 33 años de edad convive con Rubén de 33 años,  fruto de esta relación tienen 05 hijos. Ellos viven en su casa propia ubicado en el distrito de Pichari. Andrea es una cliente muy buena y bien pagadora, ella se dedica a la venta de prendas de vestir y calzados de manera ambulante; esta labor lo realiza juntamente con su querido esposo. Y a los lugares que mas frecuentan con sus productos son todo el valle de su localidad hasta puerto Ene. Para ellos el trabajo empieza los días miércoles donde recorren los tantos pueblos que existen encontrando una buena cantidad de cliente en cada pueblo donde expenden sus productos y las personas que ya les conocen siempre les compran sus prendas por que ofrecen en un precio cómodo. Andrea antes de dedicarse a esta labor se dedicaba a la venta de verduras que también era rentable pero tenía una desventaja por que los productos perecían tan rápido, es por ello que cambio el rubro de su negocio. Mas adelante está pensando alquilar un puesto de venta en la misma localidad de pichari para ya no estar trasladándose de un lugar a otro por que es muy trabajoso. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar una  vez más el pago de sus cuotas. Andrea está feliz y contenta con su banco comunal por que son puntuales. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles incrementará mas prendas de vestir.
texts.en: Andrea, 33, lives with Ruben, 33, and together they have 5 children.  They live in their own home, located in the Pichari district.  Andrea is a very good client with a good credit history.  She has a business selling clothing and shoes in an itinerant manner.  She does this work along with her beloved husband.  They take their products throughout all of the valley, from their town to as far as Puerto Ene. For them, this work begins on Wednesdays when they go around to many towns, looking for a good quantity of customers in each town to whom they can sell their products.  Also, the people who already know them always buy their garments, because they offer them for sale at an affordable price.  Before doing this kind of work, Andrea used to sell vegetables, which was also profitable, but this business had the disadvantage that the products were very perishable.  This is why she switched to selling clothing.  In the future, she is thinking of renting a sales stall in the same town of Pichari, so that she would not have to travel from one place to another to sell her clothing, because this is very arduous work.  This is the second loan that she has taken with MFP, and so she promises once more to make all of her scheduled payments.  Andrea is happy and content with her communal bank, because everyone in the group is punctual with their payments.  With the 3,000 Peruvian soles she requests, she will buy more garments to sell.

loans.use: to buy more garments to sell

loans.name: Luz Radiante - Chupaca Group

texts.es:
L. Sra. Vilma de 47 años de edad, pertenece Alcancía Comunal Luz Radiante - Chupaca, todos los integrantes del anterior ciclo demostraron ser puntuales con las cuotas de sus pagos.
 
Vilma le va muy bien en la ventas de abarrotes al por mayor y menor, queda satisfecha por lo resultados de la ventas semestrales.
El prestamo solicito para la compra de mercadería y surtir su tienda para obtener más ingresos. Vilma hizo que sus hijos lograran por culminar sus estudios profesionales. quedando agradecida por el prestamo.
texts.en:
Vilma, 47 years old, belongs to the Luz Radiante - Chupaca communal bank. All of the members from the last cycle demonstrated punctuality with regard to their loan repayment schedules.

Vilma is doing very well selling groceries wholesale and retail. She is satisfied with the results of her sales for the last six months.

She is asking for the loan to purchase merchandise and stock her store in order to obtain more income. Vilma made it so that her children will succeed by finishing their professional studies. She is thankful for the loan.

loans.use: to buy merchandise to stock her store.

loans.name: Hajar

texts.en:
Because Hajar is a conservative person, she preferred that her son Omar appear in the photo instead of her.

Hajar, 63, is married and living with her husband, her single daughter and her son in a rented house. 

Four years ago, Hajar helped her son Omar, a 25-year-old single guy, to start a small business by opening a small cafeteria selling hot drinks, like tea, coffee, hot chocolate, etc.

Since he started he has been doing very well, now his mother Hajar wants to do some maintenance for the cafeteria and expand the business by opening more shops in other places and build a chain for her son to be responsible for, thus she has applied for a loan.

loans.use: to do some maintenance for the cafeteria

loans.name: Azzam

texts.en: Azzam, 45, supports a family of four members. With his warm smile he welcomes and serves his customers in his grocery store that is located near his house in Al Zarqa. Azzam sells different types of food products such as canned beans, sugar, candy and others. He also has a small section selling frozen products that he wants to expand, so he applied for a loan to buy more frozen products such as chicken and other meats.

loans.use: to buy more frozen products such as chicken and other meats

loans.name: Cristina

texts.en:
Cristina has managed her furniture business for almost 14 years. She is 54 years old and married to Bienvinido. She and her husband live with her mother.

Cristina is thankful because even though she only completed elementary school, she is still able to operate her furniture business. She produces chairs, tables and cabinets made from bamboo. She is also engaged in a hog raising business and is presently raising 13 piglets and one sow. Cristina currently spends her income on her hogs and basic necessities. Cristina would like to increase her profit in order to develop her finished products and thereby offer them at a higher price. To make her dreams come true, Cristina is asking for a loan of PHP 3,000 to be used to buy bamboo, nails and varnish for her manufacturing business. She hopes that she will get her requested loan amount.

loans.use: to buy bamboo, nails and varnish

loans.name: Sawsan

texts.en:
Sawsan, a 47-year-old married woman, used to work at a governmental entity till she retired recently. Her husband also has retired from the military. 

Sawsan started two years ago making ceramic and mosaic art for sale, and in that way she has added another source of income beside their retirement salaries. She finds joy making jars and vases from ceramics.

She has applied for a loan to open a small workshop for making this type of crafts and employing a few crafters to increase the productivity in addition to help more families with their incomes.

loans.use: to open a small workshop for ceramic crafts

loans.name: Thana'

texts.en:
Thana’, 57 years old and widowed, lives in a rented house. Thana’ has two married sons who sometimes help her.

Four years ago, Thana’ started a small business using her connections selling cosmetics, make-up and accessories to be able to pay the rent and live a decent life. She hopes that she can separate her business from her house and open an accessories and make-up store in the market, so she has applied for a loan to increase the quantity she has of products.

loans.use: to increase her inventory of cosmetics and accessories

loans.name: Faten

texts.en:
Faten, 38 years old and a housewife, has two sons and three daughters. Her husband works in one of the Jordanian Entities.

Faten has learned and inherited the embroidery skill from her mother,. She used to make small napkins when she was young for her own use. Lately, to help her husband in supporting their family, Faten started to put her skills into action and make embroidered dresses, pillow covers, and other items to sell.

Faten is now working on finding some retailers in the market through whom she can sell her products. She wants to have her own store in the future, but in the meantime she is concentrating on having variety in what she makes and trying to reach retailers and distributors to market her products, so she has applied for a loan to make more embroidered items and distribute to the shops.

loans.use: to make more embroidered items and distribute them to the shops

loans.name: Ghada

texts.en:
Ghada is a 38-year-old married woman with two children of her own, and another six sons and daughters of her husband’s. He works as a school bus driver while Ghada does the housework.

Ghada thought that she could help in improving their living conditions by doing some work at home, so she started doing what she is good at which is making artificial plants and selling them. She sometimes also buys already made artificial plants and flowers so she can cover her customers' needs.

Now Ghada has applied for a loan to buy more of those artificial plants and buy more material that is used to make them.

loans.use: to buy more of those artificial plants

loans.name: Fudiya

texts.en:
Fudiya, a 59-year-old housewife, lives with her husband and three children. 

Her husband is a farmer who works in a private farm. To help her husband and to improve her family’s living conditions, Fudiya started a home products retail business. She also added selling clothes and detergents to her services.

Fudiya hopes that one day she can open a general store beside her house for selling her products, but now she has applied for a loan to increase the quantity of home products and clothes she has on offer.

loans.use: to increase the quantity of home products and clothes.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda manages a food stall business in their place. She offers daily meals through her simple eatery business to earn a living. She is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 40,000 to buy raw ingredients such spices, meats, vegetables and chicken. To completely provide good service to her customers, she will also buy added plates, spoons and forks.   

Managing her business for 10 years now has been worth working with, for it helps her in meeting the needs of her family. She is earning a net income of PHP 200 in the business daily.   

She is already 43 years old, a mother of four children who are all currently studying. Her husband is a fireman in their town. Together, the couple is working hard to provide their children a complete education. Whatever their achievements someday will somehow repay the sacrifices shared by Imelda.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients such spices, meats, vegetables and chicken.

loans.name: Buthaina

texts.en:
Buthaina, a 43-year-old housewife has four sons and daughters. Her husband works at making bricks and blocks.

Buthaina started two years ago selling clothes at her house to neighbors and relatives. She has applied for a loan to buy more clothes  and a variety to include kids' and women’s clothing.

loans.use: to buy more clothes  with a variety including kids' and women’s clothing.

loans.name: Safiya

texts.en:
Safiya, a 48-year-old housewife, is married to an employee at an aluminum retail company. They have five sons and daughters.

A year ago, Safiya started selling accessories and make-up products at home. She has applied for a loan to add selling clothes to what she sells so she can have variety in her products and increase the profit she makes.

loans.use: to add clothes to her inventory of goods sold

loans.name: Doli

texts.es: Doli, de 50 años es una mujer amable, buena y muy trabajadora, es conviviente con Aurelio de 57 años con quien tiene seis hijos a quienes brindó educación y crió con buenos modales y hábitos. Vive en casa propia en donde ahora trabaja mucho para poder asegurar su vejez. Todos los días Doli desde muy temprano se levanta y hace las tareas de su hogar, una vez que tiene todo arreglado en su casa sale al mercado y compra ingredientes seleccionados y frescos con los que utilizará para el proceso de preparación de alimentos. Lleva realizando éste trabajo por seis años y en su casa donde atiende a sus comensales van a diario muchas personas en busca de un plato de comida delicioso y muy bien servido como ella sabe brindar. Le gusta mucho tener este trabajo ya que le permite disponer mucho de sus tiempo durante el día ya que solo vende por las noches y además con los años de trabajo supo ganar a sus clientes en base a buen trato y siempre atender con una sonrrisa. Ahora tiene buenas ventas y con lo mismo tiene buenos ingresos, ahora espera seguir creciendo y aumentar con mas mesas y sillas para brindar mas comodidades a sus clientes. Este será el préstamo numero 8 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá mas segura de avanzar con su negocio, Por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo, además le agrada mucho trabajar con los integrantes de su banco comunal ya que todos son muy responsables y solidario. Con el monto solicitado 3000 soles comprará ingredientes y materiales para continuar con su trabajo, además de implementarse con sillas y mesas para su negocio.
texts.en: Doli, age 50, is a friendly, good and very hard-working woman. She lives together with Aurelio, age 57, with whom she has six children. She provided her children with education and raised them with good manners and good habits. She lives in her own house where she is now working hard to provide security for her old age. Every day, Doli gets up very early and takes care of the household chores. Once she has everything fixed up at home, she goes out to the market and buys well-chosen and fresh ingredients which she will use to prepare food. She has been doing this work for six years. She sells her meals from her home, and many people come each day in search of a plate of delicious and well-served food the way she knows how to provide it. She enjoys having this work very much, because it allows her to have control over her time during the day, since she only sells at night. During her years of work, she has been able to attract customers thanks to her good service, always provided with a smile. Now she has good sales and thus a good income. She hopes to continue to grow and expand with more tables and chairs to provide more comfort to her customers. This will be her eighth loan with MFP, and she is very happy to know that she has financial support, since it lets her feel more secure in moving ahead with her business. At the same time, she is committed once again to fulfilling her payment schedule, as in her previous loans. She is also very grateful to be working with the members of her communal bank, since all of them are very responsible and have a strong sense of solidarity. With the amount she is requesting, 3000 Peruvian soles, she will buy ingredients and supplies to continue with her work, in addition to improving her business with more tables and chairs.

loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare more food, as well as tables and chairs.

loans.name: Macaes Group

texts.es:
El grupo Macaes está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Karen Auxiliadora de 25 años quien tiene una pulpería. Este negocio lo inicio con la venta de helados, chiverías y poco a poco fue incrementado. Ella invertirá el crédito en productos para surtir la venta y en útiles escolares. Su meta es recuperar su negocio ya que por situaciones había de caído un poco.
Las otras integrantes son Ana de 48 años quien vende de todo un poco desde sopa, hielo, gelatina…etc. Y  Fátima de 51 años tiene una pequeña venta.
texts.en:
The group "Macaes" is made up of 3 hardworking and enterprising people.  One of these is Karen Auxiliadora, 25, who has a grocery store.  She started this business selling ice cream and snacks, and little by little it grew.  She will invest this loan in grocery products for her store and in school supplies.  Her goal is to get her business back on track, because due to certain situations it had fallen off a bit.

The other members of this group are Ana, 48, who sells a little bit of everything, from soup to ice to gelatin, and Fatima, 51, who also has a small store.

loans.use: to buy school supplies and staple grains

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy additional clothes to sell in the market.
