loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional items of clothing to sell in the market.

loans.name: Hanan

texts.en:
Because Hanan is a conservative person, she asked her son Mahmoud to take her place in the photo.

Hanan, a 49-year-old housewife, has seven sons and daughters. Her husband works selling scrap. Her son Mahmoud also works in the same business. They collect scrap and gather it in their back yard.

Hanan has applied for a loan to start building a storage room for the scrap her husband and son collect.

loans.use: to start building a storage room for the scrap her husband and son collect.

loans.name: Jameeleh

texts.en:
Jameeleh, 42, is a hard-working woman. Besides taking care of the housework and her children, Jameeleh chose to start tailoring as her business to help her husband in supporting their family. So she bought a sewing machine and started tailoring blouses and dresses to sell. 

Now Jameeleh has applied for a loan to buy more materials and tools needed to increase her productivity.

loans.use: to buy more materials and tools needed.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy additional clothes to sell in the market.

loans.name: Genie

texts.en:
Genie is a cheerful person and enjoys her daily activities in her home-based business selling books, encyclopedias and magazines to the people in her village, especially students. Genie's hobby of reading books motivated her to open up this business.

Genie has three grown-up children. She is asking for additional capital to invest in buyng additional books, dictionaries, thesaurus and magazines to sell. With the additional quantity of items to be sold, she expects to generate more profits. 

Aside from generating good income from the business, she hopes to satisfy all her customers with high quality products and the friendly services she offers.

loans.use: to buy additional books, dictionaries, thesaurus and magazines to sell.

loans.name: Petra

texts.en:
Petra manages a small store in front of her house at Cataggaman. She has been running it for over 15 years. Her profits are just enough for their daily consumption but she had an unstable profit. She is now asking for a loan of P43,000 to buy more merchandise to sell such as rice, canned goods, soft drinks and eggs. This will increase sales capacity.

Upgrading her family's living conditions is her primary goal aside from creating a good relationship with her customers.

loans.use: to buy rice, canned goods, soft drinks and eggs to sell in her store.

loans.name: Teresa

texts.en:
"Patience and dedication to work are the key in order to attain success in life" says Tereza.  She is 49 years old, married with two children.  According to her, the eldest is already working while the youngest is still studying.

Tereza has been in the hog raising business for almost 20 years.  She is currently raising three hogs.  With her determination to improve their living condition and to support her youngest child's education, she is doing her best.  One of the ways to attain her goal is make her hogs healthy by feeding them well and giving them vitamins.  But due to the high cost of feed and vitamins for hogs, Tereza could not buy them due to a shortage of capital.  So, Tereza would like to take out for a loan PHP 10,000.  She will be using this amount to buying feed.  She hopes that through the loan she requested she is able to make her dreams come true and she can also repay the loan amount.

loans.use: To buy feed and vitamins to raise her hogs.

loans.name: Roland

texts.en:
At the age of 25, Roland already has one kid.  He is married to a loving housekeeper.  To support his family's daily basic needs, Roland runs a baby cono business which is grinding rice in their village.  He is also engaged in the farming business.  He plants and harvests rice on his farm.

Roland wishes to harvest a good quality of crops in every season.  He might achieve it by improving his techniques in farming.  With regard to his farming business, Roland is asking for a loan of PHP 25,000 to buy fertilizer and herbicides for his crops.  It would be helpful for him to attain his wish.

loans.use: To buy fertilizer and herbicides for his crops.

loans.name: Lovelyn

texts.en:
Lovelyn raises hogs. She is 48 years old and has been doing this kind of work for over six years. She sells the grown animal whenever it reaches maturity. She needs additional capital to sustain her hogs. She is requesting a loan of Php15,000 to buy feed, medicines, and vitamins for the hogs' sustainability. She believes that, with proper growth and nutrition, the hogs will be marketed at a higher price and increase her profits. 

Lovelyn has two grownup children, but she doesn't want to rely on their remittances and so she hopes to further develop the business and achieve financial independence.

loans.use: to buy feed, medicines, and vitamins for hogs

loans.name: Jose

texts.en:
Jose lives in the village of Baringin Norte, Province of Isabela.  He is 45 years old, married and has five children.  

Jose has been involved in animal husbandry for the last three years.  He primarily breeds livestock at his home.  Now, he is requesting this loan, in the amount of PHP 15,000 to purchase feed, vaccines and additional hogs to raise.  He wants to develop his business to earn a higher income and save some of it for any future emergencies in his family.

loans.use: To purchase feed, vaccines and additional hogs to raise.

loans.name: Ronaldo

texts.en:
Ronaldo, a 45-year-old father of three school-aged children, is the operator of a motorcycle service that has been in operation for ten years.  He works hard everyday just to meet the needs of his family.

Ronaldo is requesting a loan of PHP 7,000 (Philippine pesos) to buy paint, wheels and gas for the maintenance of his transport motorcycle.  He hopes to increase his profits so that he can sustain the financial needs of his family, improve their standard of living and save money for future emergencies.

loans.use: To buy paint, wheels and gas for the maintenance of his transport motorcycle.

loans.name: Mary Ann

texts.en:
Being responsible, Mary Ann works hard to improve her family's standard of living.  To earn a living, Mary Ann engaged in hog-raising business.  The main source of income for the business comes from raising hogs for sale.  She has been in this business for many years.  She earns about PHP 7,000 per hog after fattening them.

As of now, Mary Ann is requesting a loan amounting to PHP 20,000 to purchase feed and vitamins to sustain her hogs.  She hopes that she can get the amount she requested in order to further develop her business.

loans.use: To purchase feed and vitamins to sustain her hogs.

loans.name: Dionicia

texts.en:
Dionicia was born in the year of 1960. She is married and has raised two children. Her family's primary business is fattening up and selling livestock. This business started in the year of 2009 with an initial amount of PHP5,000. For now, Dionicia earns about PHP 8,000 per hog.

In order to further increase and develop her business, Dionicia is requesting a loan in the amount of PHP15,000 to purchase feed and an additional hog to raise.

loans.use: to purchase feed and an additional hog to raise

loans.name: Irene

texts.en:
Irene shows patience and determination in achieving her dreams. She would like to give a better life to her family. She did not finish her education. Thus, to generate income, she keeps busy all day long managing her sari-sari store in front of her house. She has been operating this business for almost seven years and she earns approximately PHP250 each day in this business. She has three children. Her youngest is still attending school and might need daily allowances.

Irene is now asking for a loan of PHP25,000 to buy soft drinks, canned goods, sugar, and cooking oil to sell in her store. She needs to stock more commodities in her store to increase the capacity of sales from her business.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, canned goods, sugar, cooking oil to sell

loans.name: Jonard

texts.en:
Jonard is 25 years old. He is married and has two children who are in elementary school. He is a farmer, planting rice in their farm. Jonard’s wife is a housekeeper and his partner in managing their rice field. He has been in this business for four years.
Jonard usually gains income from his rice farming business, which he uses to purchase fertilizers and insecticides for the next crop. Since he got a minimal yield in his crop because of a previous typhoon, Jonard is requesting a loan of P25,000 for additional capital to buy seeds, fuel and fertilizers for his rice field.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fuel and fertilizers for his rice field.

loans.name: Virginia

texts.en:
Virginia has three children in school. They are in the high school and college level of education. Virginia is 38 years of age and is married. Her husband is a farmer. Virginia helps her husband in managing their rice farming business to have a better yield. She always wishes to get higher income from the business.

Virginia’s priority in life is to generate a better quality life for her family. She believes that the best way to give this is to give them the opportunity to attend college and finish their education. She also believes that one of the best ways to alleviate poverty is education.

Virginia and her husband are doing their best to attain her wish. They do some farming activities to minimize their labor expense. Now, Virginia is asking for a loan of P25,000 to buy rice seed to grow and fertilizers for the sustenance of their farm. She hopes that the loan will have a positive impact on her farming business.

loans.use: to buy rice seed to grow and fertilizers for the sustenance of their farm.

loans.name: Vinencia

texts.en:
Vinencia is 48 years old. She has six children.  Vinencia is a widowed, and she is managing their hog-raising business. She has been in her business for one year. She describes herself as a patient and industrious mother. Being a single parent is very difficult, but Vinencia does her best to meet their needs and to lift her children from poor living.

Her business serves as a source of income for the family that helps her provide their daily needs. Now, she is requesting a loan of P15,000 (Philippine Pesos) to buy feed for raising her piglets. She wants to develop her business, to earn a higher income, and save some of it for any future emergencies in her family.

loans.use: to buy feed for raising her piglets.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a variety of grocery items such as candies, canned goods and instant noodles

loans.name: Rogelio

texts.en:
Rogelio is a farmer. He plants and harvests rice in their farm within their village. He keeps on visiting his crop in their field to assure that it is in good condition. He does this because he has his goal in life, giving the best way of living for his family.

Rogelio’s wife is a housekeeper. They are blessed with three children. Rogelio and his wife are patiently running their rice farming business to continue sending their children to school until college. 

Rogelio is requesting a loan of P25,000 to buy rice seeds to grow in his farm. He will also use the loan to buy fertilizers and insecticides for plant care. Rogelio plans to improve his way of managing his farm to get higher income from the business and achieve his goal.

loans.use: to buy rice seed to grow in his farm and fertilizers and insecticides for plant care.

loans.name: Feliza

texts.en:
Feliza owns and manages her hog raising and furniture businesses.  For six years of raising hogs, Feliza has been able to sustain her family needs. Feliza is grateful that her business is growing and that they are able to have their furniture business as well.

Feliza would like to concentrate on her hog raising business because she has been raising three fattening hogs.  According to her, livestock is quite difficult to manage now because of abrupt increases in the price of feeds.  In this regard, Feliza is facing a shortage of capital.  She is asking for financial assistance in the amount of P15,000.  She will utilize this loan to purchase feeds. She knows that she can be a successful entrepreneur someday through continuous support by the lenders.

loans.use: to purchase feed for her hog raising business

loans.name: Marites

texts.en:
Marites is 39 years old, married and blessed with two children. For the past 20 years of running her business, she has sustained her family’s living. In the field of business she chose, she feels little bit difficult because her business environment is full of competitors but despite that, she still hoping for a better profit every day. Until then she needs to be extra hard-working and patient in selling vegetables to gain higher income.


She is requesting a loan of 10,000 pesos to buy additional vegetables to sell such as root crops, string beans, bitter melon and green leafy vegetables. These products are in demand and usually requested by her customers so she wants to purchase more. She just hopes that through these goods, she will be able to expand her business for the security of their living and their future.

loans.use: to buy additional vegetables to sell such as root crops, string beans, bitter melon and green leafy vegetables

loans.name: Luzviminda

texts.en: Luzviminda has been managing her sari-sari (variety store) for almost three years. Her daily income from the business goes to meals and allowances for her children. She has four children. She is now 49 years old and her spouse works as a local farmer. Due to insufficient capital to expand her business, Luzviminda is asking for a loan of 7,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy soft drinks, bread, curls and canned goods to sell in her store. She would like to stock more groceries to attract more customers and thus increase her earnings to meet all the needs of her family. In the future, Luzviminda would like to strengthen her business to earn more profits and make her family more cost-effectively stable. She also wants to be able to save for future expenses.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, breads, curls and canned goods to sell

loans.name: Alfredo

texts.es:
Alfredo es un joven de 23 años que siempre ha deseado salir adelante y constantemente lucha para poder hacerlo y demostrarse a sí mismo que puede lograr grandes cosas, con esta motivación de superación y con la finalidad de generar recursos para estudiar decidió brindar el servicio de cabinas de internet, negocio que le resulta muy rentable y está contento por los progresos que tiene.

Actualmente el trabaja a partir de las 8 de la mañana hasta las 8 de la noche, tiempo que le permite poder estudiar en las noches y desarrollar profesionalmente. Él está seguro que su negocio cada vez tiene mayor acogida debido a que siempre ha brindado un buen trato a sus clientes y también brinda una gran diversidad de programas entretenidos para sus clientes frecuentes.

Con la ayuda de los prestatarios Kiva, este joven estudiante podrá realizar el mantenimiento necesario para las máquinas que posee y también quiere comprarle algunos accesorios como audífonos, parlantes, mouse, entre otros, esto se debe a que los que posee se encuentran muy desgastados.
Su sueño es desarrollarse profesionalmente como Ing. Agrónomo y también desea obtener un ingreso adicional con el negocio de cabinas de internet que actualmente.
texts.en:
Alfredo, 23, is a young man who has always wanted to get ahead in life and is constantly struggling to make it and prove himself that he can accomplish great things. Using this feeling of self-improvement and in order to make profits to pay for his education, he decided to start a business offering Internet access, which is highly profitable for him. He is happy with the way his business progresses.

Today, he works from 8 AM to 8 PM, and this way he is able to study during the night and develop professionally. He is sure his business is attracting more and more customers because he has always been polite to customers and also because he offers a great variety of amusing software for his regular customers.

With the help from Kiva lenders, this young student will be able to service his computers as needed and buy some accessories such as headsets, speakers, mice, among others, because the ones he has are in bad conditions.
His dream is to develop professionally and become an Agricultural Engineer and also earn extra income from his current Internet access business.

loans.use: To service his computers and buy accesories (headsets and mice, among others).

loans.name: Jennifer

texts.en:
Jennifer is a hardworking woman. She is 29 years old and married. The couple are blessed with only one child, currently studying. Her dream for her only child is for her to finish her studies. Jennifer has been running a hog-raising business for six months, while her husband is busy in a farming business. She and her husband work together in order to earn a living. One of their goals is to increase their profit to meet the many expenses of their house, provide an allowance for their child and cover other obligations they pay. Given her situation, Jennifer is encouraged to be able to borrow additional capital in the amount of 15,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy feed for her three piglets.

Jennifer knows that proper management of her business and wise use of her income will result in a fruitful outcome. In this way, she can save some money for her child's future and for emergency purposes when she and her husband get weak.

loans.use: to buy feed for her three piglets

loans.name: Ivy Pearl

texts.en:
Ivy Pearl is 20 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married. Ivy Pearl has a food shop in a school canteen. She makes and sells snacks like pan and cheesecakes. She is also selling candies, chocolates and biscuits. She has had this business for two years. She requested a loan of 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy raw ingredients for making snacks. 

Ivy Pearl is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Ivy Pearl hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients for making snacks

loans.name: Avita

texts.en:
Avita is 53 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with six children.
 
Avita has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan for 5,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Avita is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Avita hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Editha

texts.en:
Editha is 27 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with one child. 

Editha has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 5,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Editha is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Editha hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell.

loans.name: Adelyn

texts.en:
Adelyn is 28 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single with one child. 

Adelyn has a pigpen to sell grown and matured pigs. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 5,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy animal feeds for the pigs.

Adelyn is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Adelyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy animal feeds for the pigs.

loans.name: Rut T

texts.es: Rutt, de 39 años es una mujer trabajadora. Hace poco se separó de su esposo, con quien tiene 2 hijos: Bily y Angely, de los que ahora cuida en casa de su madre, ubicada en la ciudad del Tambo.  Ante la necesidad de tener un ingreso para mantener a sus hijos. Tuvo información por una amiga sobre la venta de productos de belleza por catalogo y es así que comenzó con este negocio, los inicios de fueron muy duros  porque tenia que ir de casa en casa para conseguir clientes y seleccionar aquellos confiables para la venta de sus productos. Pasaron 7 años desde aquel entonces y ahora cuenta con un capital considerable que le permite mantenerse en su negocio, tiene una vitrina  en su casa donde  pude  mostrar a sus clientas la variedad de productos de belleza de marcas reconocidas. Pero como aprendió las técnicas de venta, hace poco incursionó en la venta al por mayor de productos de ferretería, donde tiene mucho éxito, pero como ella no se queda atrás y es muy dinámica, comenzó también a vender yogurt natural, pues sabe de la demanda que tiene. Ahorra sus intensiones son ahorrar todo lo que pueda, para pagar los estudios de sus hijos. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “porvenir 2 de mayo” y este es el onceavo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Rutt, de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de mercadería diversa para abastecer su negocio de ferretería, yogurt y productos de belleza.
texts.en:
39-year-old Rutt is a working woman. She recently separated from her husband, with whom she has 2 children: Bily and Angely. The children live with Rutt, whose home is located in the town of Tambo. Rutt needed to have an income to support their children. She learned from a friend about selling beauty products from catalogues, and so she started her business. 

At the beginning, it was hard because she had to go from house to house to get customers, and select those which were reliable to sell her products to. It took 7 years, but Rutt now earns a considerable capital that allows her to continue with her business. She has a glass display case at home where she can show her clients a variety of beauty products and brands. 

As Rutt learned more about sales techniques, she recently ventured into selling wholesale hardware products which has been very successful. As Rutt is very dynamic and tries to stay ahead, she also started selling natural yoghurt as she knew about the large demand for the product. 

Rutt's intention is to save everything she can to pay for her children's education. She belongs to the solidarity group "Porvenir 2 de Mayo" and this is her eleventh loan with MFP. She is hoping for their cooperation so that she can pursue her goals. In turn, Rutt promises to comply with the payment schedule. Rutt enjoys being part of the communal bank because all members are responsible and united. Rutt, upon receiving this support, will invest the loan in the purchase of various goods to supply her hardware, yoghurt and beauty products business.

loans.use: to purchase goods to supply her hardware business as well as her beauty products business.

loans.name: Evelyn Sarai

texts.es:
Evelyn, quiere seguir fortaleciendo su negocio de bisutería y cosméticos, por eso solicita un nuevo préstamo para la compra de hilos, piedras de diferentes colores y estilos, dijes, además de comprarse maquillaje, polvos, labiales.
Esta compra le ayudara para aumentar la mercadería en el negocio, ella considera que estos préstamos le han ayudado para mejorar , ya que ha generado más ventas y ganancias para aportar a su familia.
texts.en:
Evelyn wants to continue to strengthen her business selling jewelry and cosmetics, so she has requested a new loan to buy thread, stones of different colors and styles, charms, and also makeup, powders, and lipsticks.

This investment will help to increase the supply of merchandise for her business, and Evelyn believes that these loans have helped her to improve as she has generated more sales and profits which she uses to provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy thread, stones of different colors and styles, charms, and makeup.

loans.name: Diomedes

texts.en:
Diomedes is 46 years old and lives in the Philippines. He is married with five children. Diomedes has a rice field and harvests and sells rice grains during harvest time. He has had this business for 10 years. He requested a loan of 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy fertilizers for the rice farm.

Diomedes is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Diomedes hopes to improve his business.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers for a rice farm

loans.name: Gilda

texts.en:
Gilda is 41 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with four children. Gilda is providing "motorela" (motorcycle) services with her husband as the driver. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan of 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy tools and pay for gasoline for the service.

Gilda is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Gilda hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy tools and pay for gasoline for a motorela service

loans.name: Carmen

texts.es: Carmen, de 23 años es una mujer soltera. Vive en compañía de su mamá Antonia, a la que cuida en una casa alquilada, ubicada en la ciudad de Huancayo. Hace 6 años murió su papá desde entonces cuidó de su madre, a pesar de su corta edad, sabía que tenía que afrontar con madures las dificultades. Comenzó a trabajar desde muy niña. Por eso cuenta con orgullo que gracias a ello, ahora le falta poco para terminar su carrera de Administración de empresas, sabe que lo logrará pues a pesar de las dificultades que la vida le pone, sabe que saldrá exitosa. Hace 5 meses falleció su hermana mayor, quien se encargaba del restaurante donde vende anticuchos (comida típica de Perú), ahora ella asumió esa responsabilidad con optimismo, todavía se encuentra triste por lo sucedido. Cuenta que durante las mañanas para no perder dinero, alquila su local a una señora que vende jugos, ya en la tarde ella sale a ofrecer los ricos platos hasta la noche. Tiene muchas ideas para remodelar su restaurante y convertirla en un lugar agradable y de buen gusto. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “porvenir 2 de mayo” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Carmen de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de más mesas para su restaurante.
texts.en:
Carmen, a 23 year old woman, is single. She lives with her mother Antonia caring for her in a rented house, located in the city of Huancayo. Her father died 6 years ago and since then she has cared for her mother. Despite her young age, she knew she had to cope with the difficulties with maturity.

She started working when she was very young. And so with pride thanks to this, now she is almost finished her business administration studies. She knows that she will manage the difficulties that life gives her, she knows that she will succeed.

Five months ago her older sister died, who was in charge of the restaurant where she sells anticuchos (kebabs, typical food of Peru). Now she assumed this responsibility with optimism, although still finding herself sad about what happened. 

During the mornings, in order not to lose money, she rents the facility to a lady that sells juices, and in the afternoon she offers delicious dishes until night. She has many ideas about remodeling her restaurant and making it into a pleasant and refined place. 

She belongs to the solidarity group “Porvenir 2 de Mayo” and this is her first loan through MFP, where she is hoping for cooperation, in order to continue with her plans. At the same time she promises to make her payments. Furthermore, she likes being a part of her communal bank because all the members are trustworthy and supportive. Carmen upon receiving your help will invest the requested amount in the purchase of more tables for the restaurant.

loans.use: to buy more tables

loans.name: Cristina

texts.es: Cristina, de 42 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de su papá Roberto al que cuida en su casa propia, ubicada en la ciudad del Tambo. En la búsqueda de oportunidades para generar ingresos ha desarrollado varias actividades como la venta de productos de belleza por catálogos, además de recolectar materiales descartables y para reciclaje, los cuales vende a una empresa reconocida en el rubro. Pero su principal actividad es el servicio de lavado de ropa, cuenta con 3 lavadora, su experiencia de 3 años en el rubro le ayudaron a tener clientes fijos que constantemente la visitan. Según comenta,, el producto agregado que brinda es el lavado de frazadas, con lo que obtiene más ingresos, por eso quiere comprar una nueva lavadora más grande. Su filosofía de trabajo siempre ha consistido en hacer un trabajo con excelencia y esto le permite ganar la confianza de sus clientes que a su vez recomiendan sus servicios. Ahora quiere contactarse con las empresas de reciclaje de la capital para ampliar ese negocio, ya que ve un buen futuro ahí. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “porvenir 2 de mayo” y este es el décimo crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Cristina de recibir su apoyo, invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de una lavadora nueva para su negocio.
texts.en: Cristina, 42, is a hardworking woman.  She lives with her father, Roberto, who she cares for in her own home, located in the city of Tambo.  In search of opportunities to generate income, she has developed a number of activities, such as the sale of beauty products through a catalog.  In addition, she collects disposable materials to recycle, which she sells to a company that is well-known in this area.  But her main economic activity is providing laundry services.  She has 3 washers, and has 3 years of experience in this line of work, which has helped her to gain regular customers who visit her constantly.  According to Cristina, the biggest service she provides is washing blankets, which generates more income for her.  For this reason, she wants to buy a new washer that is bigger.  Her work philosophy has always been to do excellent work, and this allows her to gain the confidence of her customers, who in turn recommend her services to others.  Now she wants to contact the recycling companies in the capital so that she can expand this business, because she sees a good future there.  She belongs to the communal bank "Porvenir 2 de Mayo," and this is the 10th loan that they have taken with MFP, where she awaits your cooperation so that she can continue with her plans.  Furthermore, she promises to comply with the payment terms on the loan.  In addition, she appreciates being part of her communal bank, because all of the members are supportive and responsible people.  Cristina, once she receives this loan, will invest in the purchase of a new washing machine for her business.

loans.use: to buy a new washing machine

loans.name: Trinidad

texts.es: Trinidad de 49 años de edad convive con Senobio de 44 años fruto de esta relación tienen 4 hijos, ellos viven en su casa Propia ubicado en el anexo de unión America del distrito de Pichari. Desde que las tierras del vrae fueron pobladas por los colonos que llegaron de las serranías de Ayacucho, Huancavelica y Apurimac. Muchos de ellos vieron que la agricultura es una fuente potencial para salir de la pobreza, es así que empezaron a cultivar y producir la tierra, pero e ahí el inconveniente, que se dificultaban, que fue en el traslado hacia los centros de comercialización por que no contaban con un buen acceso vial. Mientras que trinidad al ver que la población tenía dificultades en el transporte, decide dedicarse al traslado de ganados vacunos y juntamente con ello iban llevando productos de primera necesidad para ser comercializados en su comunidad. Los ganados que llevaba eran para ser sacrificados y luego vendidos, mientras que guardaba otro grupo para su reproduccción. Con el tiempo logró obtener su vehículo que le facilita el transporte y ahorran tiempo. En la actualidad Trinidad se quedo con la crianza de ganados que le va muy bien, también cuenta con una parcela agrícola en producción. En el futuro desea continuar instalando más plantaciones de cacao. Este es su segundo crédito con MFP, por lo que se compromete en cancelar puntualmente el pago de sus cuotas. Ella esta contenta con su banco comunal por que todos son puntuales. Con los 3,000 nuevos soles invertirá en la compra de mas ganados
texts.en: 49-year-old Trinidad is in a common law marriage with 44-year-old Senobio, with whom she has four children. They live in a house they own, located in the Unión America settlement of the district of Pichari. Ever since those lands were populated by settlers arriving from the highlands of Ayacucho, Huancavelica and Apurimac, many of them realized that agriculture was a potential way out of poverty. That's how they started to plant and sow the land, but there was an inconvenience that made it hard for them to take the produce to the markets, since they didn't have good access to roads. When Trinidad saw that the village had transportation difficulties, she decided to dedicate herself to transporting cattle and also to bringing essential goods for selling in her community. The cattle she took was slaughtered and soon sold. Meanwhile, she kept another group for breeding. In time, she was able to get a vehicle that makes transportation easier and saves time. Currently, Trinidad raises cattle, which has been going very well, and she also owns a small agricultural farm. In the future she wishes to keep on establishing more cacao crops. This is her second loan with MFP and she pledges to make her repayments in a timely fashion. She is happy with her communal bank, because everyone is punctual. She will invest the 3.000 nuevos soles in the purchase of more cattle.

loans.use: to purchase more animals.

loans.name: Pedro

texts.es: El señor Pedro es nacido en la ciudad de Santa Cruz de la Sierra el tiene 24 años y es soltero,  vive actualmente en la zona Nuevo Oriente en casa familiar de sus padres.  El se dedica a la venta de ropa como poleras y vestidos de forma ambulante se dedica a esta actividad  hace 2 años, El señor demostró ser responsable en su crédito anterior. Ahora el crédito otorgado al señor es para compra de  mercadería (poleras, blusas y vestidos), esta es la única actividad que el tiene para mantenerse y para correr con los gastos del hogar ya que también ayuda a su padres con estos gastos, es una persona muy responsable y muy trabajador se siente feliz por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Pedro was born in the city of Santa Cruz de la Sierra. He is 24 years old and single. He is living currently in the Nuevo Oriente area in his parents' house. He makes a living as a traveling salesman of clothes like T-shirts and dresses. He has been doing this for two years. 

Pedro proved that he was responsible with his last loan. The loan he has now is for the purchase of merchandise (T-shirts, shirts, and dresses.) This is the only way he has to make a living and keep up with household expenses, since he also helps his parents with these costs. He is a very responsible and hardworking person. He is happy because of the opportunity they have given him.

loans.use: buy merchandise like T-shirts, shirts, and dresses

loans.name: Ponciana

texts.en:
Ponciana is 50 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is widowed with three children. Ponciana has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for 20 years. She requested a loan of 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Ponciana has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Ponciana hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell

loans.name: Jhohathan Group

texts.es:
El grupo Jonathan está conformado por tres personas trabajadoras y emprendedoras una de ellas es Blanca de 48 años quien vende comida rápida (hot-dog, hamburguesa, quesadillas…etc.), comida, gaseosas y chiverías desde hace 22 años. Ella está casada y tiene 5 hijos de los cuales los dos menores están a su cargo uno de 22 años quien está en la universidad y 17 años la cual está en secundaria. 
En el negocio le ayudan su esposo y sus dos hijos menores.
Las otras integrantes son María quien tiene una refresquería donde vende de todo tipo de frescos y María del Carmen quien vende elotes, Yoltamal, tamal…etc.
texts.en: The Jhohathan communal bank is comprised of three enterprising and hardworking people. One of them is 48-year-old Blanca, who has been selling fast food (hot dogs, hamburgers, quesadillas, etc.), food, soft drinks and snacks for the past 22 years. She's married and has five children. Two of them are minors and under her care, one of them is 22 years old and in college, and another one is 17 years old and in high school. She is helped in her business by her husband and her two younger children. The other members are María who owns a refreshment stall where she sells all kinds of refreshments and María del Carmen who sells corncobs, tamales, tender corn tamales, etc.

loans.use: to purchase bread, frankfurters, meat, tortillas, etc.

loans.name: Sabina

texts.es:
Sabina, se ha decidido solicitar un nuevo préstamo, porque necesita invertir en su negocio comprando productos como arroz, tomates, chiles,condimentos, para abastecerlo de productos frescos, este préstamo le ayudara para continuar en el negocio y mantener la preferencia de los clientes.
Ella considera haber tenido un efecto positivo del préstamo anterior, por esta razón se ha decidido a seguir trabajando con la institución.
texts.en:
Sabina has decided to request a new loan because she needs to invest in her business by purchasing goods such as rice, tomatoes, hot peppers and condiments in order to stock up with fresh products. This loan will help her keep her business going and retain the preference of her customers.
She believes that she got a positive result from her previous loan and for that reason she decided to continue working with the institution.

loans.use: to purchase rice, tomatoes, hot peppers and condiments.

loans.name: Miryam

texts.es: Miryam, de 49 años es una valerosa madre soltera. Vive en compañía de sus 2 hijos: Alexandra y Renato a los que cuida en casa de sus padres, ubicada en la localidad de El Tambo. Su emprendimiento desde hace 17 años se ha mantenido hasta hoy. Miryam, es una mujer especial, la lucha por sus hijos le impulsa a progresar.  En su casa ha instalado una fuente de soda, en un lugar céntrico que es una ventaja para su negocio. Trabaja con un chef que prepara comidas al paso, su venta de comida la acompaña con gaseosas y bebidas de acuerdo al pedido y demanda de su clientela, hace 3 años tomo una decisión importante para su negocio  ya que la hizo remodelar su negocio. Pues sus clientes la visitan mucho, sobre todo los fines  de semana porque se ha convertido en una buena opción de esparcimiento. Su hija mayor, estudia derecho como ella, eso la incentiva a progresar. Ya que ella es abogada de profesión. En el segundo piso de su casa colocó una oficina de asesoría, tiene muchos clientes uno de ellos son las gobernaciones de las distintas ciudades, que le pagan por su trabajo. Recién emprendió este proyecto y espera ser reconocida como una de las mejores abogadas de la ciudad. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “porvenir 2 de mayo” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Miryam de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de utensilios de cocina para su negocio y la otra en el pago de la inicial de una nueva computadora para realizar su asesoría.
texts.en:
Miryam, 49, is a courageous single mother. She lives in her parents' home in the town of El Tambo, with her ​​2 children, Alexandra and Renato.

She started her business venture 17 years ago, which she has continued with until today. Miryam is a special woman, and fighting for her children drives her to progress. She has installed a soda fountain in her home, which is in a central location and this has proven an advantage for her business. Miryam works with a chef to prepare food 'on the go', and her food sales serve as an accompaniment to her sodas and beverages, according to customer orders and demand. Three years ago, Miryam made an important decision to remodel her business. Her customers now visit frequently, especially on weekends because her business has become a popular entertainment choice. 

Miryam's eldest daughter is studying law, as Miryam did, which gives her the incentive to succeed. Miryam is a lawyer by profession and has established a counseling office on the second floor of her house. She has many clients, including governors of different cities who pay her for her work. She has recently started this project and hopes to be recognized as one of the best lawyers in town. 

She belongs to the solidarity group "Porvenir 2 de Mayo" and this is her ninth loan with MFP. She hopes their cooperation so that she can pursue her goals. Miryam promises to comply with the payment schedule. She likes to be part of the communal bank because all members are responsible and united. Miryam will invest the loan in buying cookware for her business, and also to make the initial payment for a computer to use in her office.

loans.use: to purchase cooking utensils and a computer.

loans.name: Gonzalo Ricardo

texts.es: El sr. Gonzalo vive en la zona de bella vista en la  casa de sus padres con su familia que esta integrada de cuatro integrantes su esposa que por cuestión de trabajo esta de viaje y sus tres hijos pequeños que se encuentran ene dad escolar, los tres van a la escuela cerca de la zona, el sr. Gonzalo tiene un taller de carpintería en el mismo domicilio, no tiene crédito con otras instituciones financieras, solicita el préstamo para la compra de madera por un nuevo contrato adquirido; el Sr. Gonzalo trabaja y se esfuerza por el bienestar de sus hijos ya que en ausencia de su esposa el se encarga de cuidarlos y de educarlos, se siente feliz y agradecido por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Gonzalo lives in the Bella Vista area in his parents' house with his family, which is made up of four members: his wife, who is traveling because of work, and his three young children who are of school age.  The three of them go to school near the area.

Gonzalo has a carpentry shop in his own home.  He does not have a loan with other financial institutions.  He is requesting the loan to buy wood for a newly acquired contract.

Gonzalo works and makes the effort for the well-being of his children because, in his wife's absence, he is responsible for caring for and teaching them.  He feels happy and grateful for the opportunity that he is getting.

loans.use: to buy raw materials (wood).

loans.name: Jeoselyn

texts.en:
Jeoselyn is 23 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single with one child. Jeoselyn has a bakeshop that makes and sells breads, biscuits and pastries. She has had this business for two years. She requested a loan of 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy raw ingredients needed for making breads and pastries.

Jeoselyn is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Jeoselyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients needed for making breads and pastries

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es:
Sonia, de 37 años es una madre ejemplar. Vive en compañía de Juancarlos, su esposo. Ambos tienen 2 hijos: Milagros y Juan a los que cuida en casa de su abuela ubicada en la localidad de Huachac.  Su niñez esta muy ligada a las actividades agrícolas y durante varios años observó los bajos precios de su cosecha. Por eso emprendió el negocio de venta al por mayor, su esposo trabaja en un taller de confección en la capital del país. Donde ella viaja para vender queso, menestras y harinas de alto valor nutricional, que comercializa a las diferentes tiendas de alimentos, la modalidad es al crédito y mensualmente recibe los pagos de su trabajo. Su estrategia es estacionaria, ya que en el invierno, vende más queso y por el verano le comprar más yogurt natural. Es por eso que ahora se encuentra abasteciendo a la capital de ello, viaja cada 15 días, ya que es muy solicitada. Además muy pronto llegará la fecha de matrícula de su hija mayor a la universidad, por eso quiere aprovechar las ventas en esta temporada. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “mujeres luchadora” y este es el sexto crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
Sonia de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de alimentos para  realizar su negocio.
texts.en:
Sonia, 37, is an exemplary mother. She lives with her husband, Juan Carlos. They have 2 children, Milagros and Juan, whom they are raising in her grandmother’s house, located in the district of Huachac.

Sonia’s childhood is very closely related to agriculture and for several years she observed the low prices that her crops received.  Because of that, she started her wholesale business. Her husband works in a tailoring workshop in the capital of the country, where she travels to sell cheese, dried beans and flour of high nutritional value. She markets these products in different food stores on credit and receives monthly payments for her work. She has a seasonal marketing strategy since she sells more cheese in the winter and more natural yogurt in the summer. Consequently she is now supplying capital to stock her inventory and travels every 15 days to the capital, since her products are in high demand.  In addition, the date will soon arrive when her oldest daughter’s tuition fees are due at the university and she wants to take advantage of this season to make more sales.

Sonia belongs to the Mujeres Luchadoras Communal Bank and this is the group’s sixth loan from MFP. She is awaiting funding so she can continue to meet her objectives. She promises to comply with the re-payment schedule. She is grateful to be part of her communal bank because all the members are responsible and supportive people.

On receiving your support, Sonia will use he money to purchase food supplies for her business.

loans.use: to buy more cheese and yogurt.

loans.name: Warnenas Group

texts.es: El banco Comunal Las Warnenas esta compuesto por 8 socios que viven por la zona Norte, este grupo nació con la iniciativa de todos los socios de la zona Ignacio Warnes de ahí el nombre de grupo, todos los socios necesitan el dinero para sus negocios e incremento de capital de trabajo, este Banco comunal  esta bajo la responsabilidad de la mesa directiva que esta compuesta por la Presidente que es la Sra.  Yolanda que se dedica a la venta de ropa se dedica a esta actividad hace 3 años, ella es casada y  tiene 3 hijos que se encuentran en edad escolar, el crédito que solicita es para la compra de ropa de temporada ya que la Sra. desea variar su mercadería, ella es una persona muy responsable y dinámica por esta razón fue elegida como presidenta, es muy trabajadora trababa y se esfuerza mucho por el bienestar de sus hijos ya que son su único aliciente, su deseo de la Sra. Yolanda es el de ver a sus hijos profesionales.
texts.en: The Las Warnenas communal bank is comprised of eight members who live in the northern area. This group began by initiative of all members from the Ignacio Warnes area and that's where the group's name came from. All the members need money for their business and for increasing their working capital. This communal bank is under the responsibility of the headboard which is comprised by the president, Yolanda. She has been selling clothing for the past three years. She's married and has three school aged children. The loan she requests is for the purchase of this season's clothing, because she wants to diversify her merchandise. She's a very responsible and dynamic person, and for that reason she was elected president. She works very hard and strives to provide for her children, since they are her only incentive. Yolanda's wish is to see her children become professionals.

loans.use: to purchase clothing for the season.

loans.name: Cintia

texts.es: Cintia, de 24 años vive en compañía de Percy su esposo desde hace 2 años. Ambos viven en casa de su suegra, ubicada en el anexo de Huachac. No tiene hijos, pero quiere ser madre. Sabe que es muy joven y que todavía no cuenta con la solvencia para cuidarlo, por eso todavía no tiene planes. Su mayor deseo es titularse para poder conseguir mejores oportunidades de trabajo. Estudió educación inicial en una reconocida universidad. Ahora trabaja en un jardín de niños, durante las mañanas, ahí recibe un sueldo mensual, ya por las tardes realiza clases particulares a niños menores de 5 años. Donde aplica todos los conocimientos de estimulación temprana que adquirió, además de cursos de Matemática, para que se adapten a la escuela. Mientras su esposo estudia la carrera de odontología, que paga gracias al oficio de albañil que desempeña. Ahora ella estudia mucho para poder sacar su título y así concretar su objetivo. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “mujeres trabajadoras” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Cintia de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en el pago de sus estudios de titulación de la carrera universitaria que estudió.
texts.en:
Cintia is 24, and has been living with her husband Percy for two years. Both live in her mother-in-law's house, located in the community of Huachac. 

They don't have children, but she wants to be a mother. She knows she is very young, and still isn't in a financial position to look after one, and that's why she still has no plans in that regard. 

Her greatest desire is to get a degree, in order to be able to get better work opportunities. She studied early childhood education in a recognized university. Now she works in a kindergarten during the mornings, and receives a monthly salary there.

In the afternoons she does private classes for children under five, where she applies all the knowledge about early stimulation that she acquired, and also teaches mathematics, so that they adjust to school.  

In the meantime, her husband is studying dentistry, and pays for his studies thanks to the construction work he does. Now she studies a lot, to be able to get her degree, and so make her goal a reality.  

She belongs to the "Mujeres Trabajadoras" solidarity group, and this is her first loan with MFP. So she is hoping for your help so that she can continue toward her objectives. Moreover, she promises to make her installment payments.

In addition, she is thankful to be part of her communal bank, because all its members are responsible and supportive people.  When she receives the loan, Cintia will use the the money applied for to pay for studies toward her university degree.

loans.use: To pay for studies to obtain her university degree.

loans.name: Nilda

texts.en:
Nilda is 32 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single. Nilda has a bakeshop. She makes and sells breads, biscuits and pastries. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan of 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy raw ingredients needed for making breads.

Nilda is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Nilda hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy raw ingredients needed for making breads

loans.name: Misael

texts.es:
Misael es un joven trabajador de 25 años de edad, vive con su esposa y su mejor hijo, cuenta con una casa propia construida de material rustico, la cual esta ubicada en el Caserío rural “Los Zapatas”  perteneciente al distrito de Tambogrande el cual depende de la Provincia de Piura la cual esta a unas 3 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo aproximadamente.

La zona en la que vive Misael tiene como actividad económica principal la crianza de animales como aves de corral, ganado, ovino entre otros y además se dedican a la agricultura, actividad que no es ajena a él como padre de familia y esposo que es, por lo que en la actualidad se dedica a la crianza y posterior comercialización de animales menores en los mercados locales como en los aledaños a su caserío. Adicionalmente brinda su servicio de peón agrícola en diferentes fundos de su caserío.

Misael en su deseo de seguir creciendo en su negocio de venta de animales menores desea comprar alimentos balanceados para la buena alimentación de los que vende, la buena relación que existe con su familia le permite trazarse día a día nuevos objetivos para mejorar sus condiciones de vida, por lo que ha solicitado a Edpyme Alternativa un crédito de 1200 nuevos soles con los que atenderá sus requerimientos.


Misael es un joven que ha base de trabajo y responsabilidad se ha sabido ganar el cariño de sus vecinos quienes respetan y admiran mucho por ser un joven emprendedor.
texts.en:
Misael is a young hard-working 25 year old. He lives with his wife and his minor son. They have their own house, which is made of rustic material. It is located in the rural hamlet of "Los Zapatas" which belongs to the Tambogrande district, which is in the province of Pura, which is approximately 3 hours from the city of Chiclayo.

The main economic activity in the area in which Misael lives, is the raising of animals such as poultry, cattle, sheep, among other animals. Furthermore, they work in agriculture, an activity that is not unfamiliar to Misael, being father of the family and husband that he is. Currently he is focusing on the raising and subsequent commercialization of young animals in the local markets, as well as the outskirts of his hamlet. Additionally, he offers his services as an agricultural worker in different estates around his hamlet. 

In order to fulfill his desire of growing his animal raising business, Misael wants to buy balanced feed to ensure the proper nutrition of the animals he sells. Because of this, he is seeking a loan of 1200 nuevos soles from Edpyme Alternativa, to cover these costs. The good relationship that he has with his family allows him to set new goals for himself every day, to improve their quality of life.  

Misael is a young man with a foundation of work and responsibility, that knows how to earn the affection of his neighbors who respect and admire him very much for being a young entrepreneur.

loans.use: purchase balanced feed to ensure good nutrition for the animals that he sells.

loans.name: Jaime Nolberto

texts.es:
Jaime es un padre de familia de 48 años de edad, es padre soltero con 2 hijos a quienes mensualmente les da para su alimentación y educación correspondiente, vive en casa de su madre en un caserío rural en donde solo cuentan con energía eléctrica, el caserío tiene por nombre “Pueblo Libre”, el cual pertenece al Distrito de Tambogrande perteneciente a la provincia de Piura y la misma esta a unas 3 horas aproximadamente del Departamento de Lambayeque 

Su actividad económica principal de Jaime es la crianza y posterior comercialización de  ganado ovino, ha dicha actividad se dedica un aproximado de 5 años para lo que ya tiene sus clientes estables que continuamente realizan sus pedido, adicionalmente se genera otros ingresos dedicándose al servicio de transporte para lo que cuenta con una moto lineal transportando pasajeros de caserío en caserío, actividad que le ayuda a generarle ingresos para el sustento de sus dos hijos.
 
Jaime desea comprar alimentos balanceados para el engorde de ovinos, y por ende ponerlos a mejor precio, para lo que a solicitado un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1000 Nuevos Soles que serna suficientes para atender sus necesidades.

Jaime y sus hijos son personas muy responsables por lo que sus vecinos los respetan y consideran bastante.
texts.en:
Jaime is a 48 year old single father with 2 sons for whom he provides monthly food and education expenses. He lives with his mother in her house in a rural settlement that only has electricity. The village, called Pueblo Libre, belongs to Tambogrande District in Piura Province, about 3 hours from the Department of Lambayeque.

His principle economic activity is raising and later marketing sheep and he has been doing this task for about 5 years so that he has a stable clientele. He also earns additional income by providing transportation services on a motorcycle carrying passengers from one village to another. This business helps him generate income to support his two sons.

Jaime wants to buy feed to fatten his sheep so that he can charge a higher price. Therefore he is requesting a loan from Edpyme Alternative in the amount of 1000 nuevos soles, which will be sufficient to meet his needs.

Jaime and his sons are very responsible people and his neighbors respect them and hold them in high regard.

loans.use: to buy feed to fatten animals that he will later sell.

loans.name: Rosemarie

texts.en:
Rosemarie is 29 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with three children. 

Rosemarie has a shop that sells fish like trout, milk fish and sardines. She has had this business for five years. She requested a loan for 5,000 Philippines pesos (PHP) to buy fish to sell.

Rosemarie is a new member of HSPFI. In the future, Rosemarie hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy fish to sell.

loans.name: Gissela

texts.es: Gissela, de 35 años es una mujer emprendedora y muy trabajadora, es madre soltera de dos hijos de 19 y 8 años a quienes desde que se quedo sola les brinda educación y siempre esta al pendiente de darles lo necesario para poder tener una mejor calidad de vida. Vive en casa de sus padres y lo que mas quiere es que sus hijos sean profesionales.  Todos los días Gissela sale a visitar a sus diferentes amigos, vecinos y familiares en busca de colocar algún producto cosmético o perfume que ofrece, en algunas ocasiones espera en su casa. Pero como es una mujer dinámica y no le gusta estar sin hacer nada prefiere salir en busca de clientes. Lleva realizando 10 años este trabajo y lo hace sola ya que aprendió a realizar sus cosas sin la ayuda de nadie. Durante su tiempo de trabajo aprendió mucho, desde como llegar a los clientes y como convencerlos de comprarle algún articulo. Agradece mucho que le este yendo bien ya que es conciente que hay que trabajar mucho para poder tener éxito en este tipo de trabajo. Espera poder seguir trabajando mucho y así seguir creciendo hasta poner una tienda de cosméticos en donde pueda tener mejores ingresos. Este será el préstamo número 8 con MFP, esta muy contenta de saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se compromete una vez mas de cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además manifiesta estar feliz en este grupo ya que es una socia muy antigua y enseña a los nuevos a que se trabaja en equipo y de manera responsable y todo son así. Con el monto solicitado 2000 soles, comprará productos de oferta para tener en stock y tenerlos  listos para vender al cliente que esta en busca de ellos.
texts.en: 35-year-old Gissela is an enterprising and very hardworking woman. She's a single mother of two children aged 19 and 8. Ever since she's been single, she has provided them with an education and has always devoted herself to fulfilling their needs in order to improve their living conditions. She lives in her parents' house and her biggest wish is to see her children become professionals. Every day Gissela goes out to visit her various friends, neighbors and relatives in order to sell some of the cosmetics and perfumes she offers. On some occasions, she waits for them at her home, but since she is a dynamic woman who doesn't like doing nothing, she prefers to go out in search of customers. She has been in this line of work for 10 years and she does it alone, because she has learned to get things done without help from anyone. During her years of work, she has learned a lot, such as how to approach customers and how to convince them to buy an article. She's very thankful to be doing well, because she's aware that it takes a lot of work in order to succeed in this business. She hopes to be able to continue working hard and to expand into a cosmetics store where she can get better profits. This will be her 8th loan with MFP and she's glad to know she will have financial support, since it will give her confidence to expand her business. On the other hand, she pledges to once again make her repayments, as she has done in her previous loans. Besides, she reports that she's happy in this group, because she's been a member for a long time. She teaches the new ones how to work as a team and how to be responsible , which they all are. With the requested amount of 2.000 soles, she will purchase products on special offer in order to stock up and get them ready to sell to customers who request them.

loans.use: to purchase more cosmetics.

loans.name: Guido

texts.es: Guido, de 44 años, es un hombre que siempre trabajó mucho para poder brindar mejor condiciones de vida a su familia. Está casado con Narda de 37 años y es padre de tres hijos, Melina de 15, Alexa de 10 y José de 4 años, viven juntos en una casa propia en donde a diario comparten la alegría de educar a sus hijos e intentar brindarles una mejor calidad de vida. Como todos los días, Guido sale a las calles de la ciudad en su mototaxi en busca de sus eventuales pasajeros a quienes transporta dentro y fuera de la ciudad con bastante serenidad y tranquilidad, ya que para él la seguridad de sus pasajeros es muy importante. Además tiene un teléfono celular el cual siempre esta encendido y en espera de algún cliente que lo llame para solicitarle sus servicios de electricista, es así que diariamente pasa los días entre las calles de la ciudad y en las casas en donde requieren de un electricista con experiencia y que haga un trabajo de calidad. Lleva realizando estas actividades por 15 años y aunque al principio no le fue muy bien, ahora le va mucho mejor ya que tiene clientes que siempre lo buscan o recomiedan para trabajos de otras casas. Espera poder seguir trabajando y mas adelante implementarse con mas mototaxis para alquilarlos. Este será el préstamo número 6 con MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete una vez mas en cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas, como en anteriores crédito que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal por que todos sus integrantes son personas que son responsables y muy solidarios. Con el monto solicitado 2500 soles, comprará materiales para continuar con su trabajo, además de piezas y repuestos para refaccionar las condiciones de su mototaxi que se deterioraron por el paso del tiempo.
texts.en:
Guido, 44 years old, is a man who always worked a lot in order to be able to provide his family better living conditions. He is married to Narda, 37 years old, and he is the father of 3 children, 15 year old Melina, 10 year old Alexa, and 4 year old Jose. They live together in their own home where every day they share in the joy of educating their children and try to give them a better quality of life. Like everyday, Guida leaves for the city streets in his moto-taxi looking for his future passengers who he takes into and out of the city with plenty of serenity and tranquility, since the security of his passengers is very important.  Additionally, he has a cell phone which is always on and waiting for a client who calls him to request his electrician services. So he spends each day in the streets of the city and in the homes where they need an experienced electrician to do quality work. 

He’s been doing these jobs for 15 years, though at first it wasn’t going very well. Now things are going much better since he has customers who always search him out and recommend him for jobs at other houses. He hopes to be able to continue working and later get more moto-taxis in order to rent them. This will be his 6th loan with MFP, and so he hopes for a small loan in order to meet his goals. Also he once again promises to comply with the terms of his agreement, like with the previous loans he’s had. Furthermore he is thankful to be a part of the communal bank because all of the members are responsible and dedicated people. 

With the amount requested of 2500 soles, he will buy materials to continue his work as well as pieces and spare parts to repair his moto-taxis that has deteriorated over time.

loans.use: to buy materials and spare parts for his moto-taxi

loans.name: Lastenia

texts.es: Lastenia, de 46 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y empeñosa, con muchas ganas de progresar, está casada con Simón, quien es empleado. Vive en compañía de su esposo y su hija de 27 años de edad, habitando en su propia casa. La actividad que realiza Lastenia es la venta de abarrotes de primera necesidad para eso cuenta con una bodega la cual está instalada en su casa, desde  donde atiende a sus clientes que en su mayoría son sus propios vecinos, a quienes atiende de manera amable y cordial. A los largo de los 05 años que viene trabajando con su bodega, realiza esta actividad sola y en ocasiones con el apoyo de su  esposo en sus ratos libres. Le  gusta su trabajo pues le permite estar en la comodidad de su hogar, así como los ingresos económicos que le genera para apoyar a su pareja con los gastos de su hogar. Por lo contario, lo que no le gusta es cuando algunos de sus clientes se retrasan en el pago de sus créditos concedidos. Pero eso no la desanima y continua trabajado con las mismas ganas, ahora tiene planes de continuar con su negocio y hacerlo crecer. Este será el préstamo número 10 con la institución MFP, Por ello espera de su colaboración para que pueda concretar sus planes. Además de estar a gusto con banco comunal pues le agrada el trabajo que viene realizando apoyando a las personas a avanzar con sus proyectos. Con el monto solicitado de 1500 nuevos soles lo invertirá en la compra de más abarrotes buscando precios más cómodos por sus compras al contado, para así surtir su bodega y contar con preferencia de sus clientes.
texts.en:
Lastenia, 46, is a diligent, hardworking woman who greatly wants to succeed. She is married to Simon, who is employed. She lives in her own house with her husband and 27 year old daughter. Lastenia sells grocery staples in a store installed in her house where she waits on customers who are largely her neighbors. She does so in a cordial and friendly manner. During the 5 years she has been working in her store, she has done so alone and only occasionally supported by her husband in his free time.

Lastenia likes her work since it enables her to remain comfortably at home and it generates income that helps her husband with household expenses.  On the other hand, she does not like it when some of her customers are late paying on credit extended to them. But this does not discourage her and she continues working with the same enthusiasm. Now she plans to expand her business. 

This will be loan number 10 with MFP. Consequently she hopes for your collaboration so she can concretize her plans. As well she enjoys her communal bank since she likes the work it is doing to help people advance in their businesses. She will invest the 1,500 nuevos soles requested in buying groceries and look for better prices on cash purchases so that she can stock her store and have those products preferred by her clientele.

loans.use: to purchase products wholesale to stock her store.

loans.name: Tep

texts.en:
Mrs. Tep, age 55, is a married woman who has been living in Ornlong Veng district, Siem Reap province. She earns a livelihood by being involved in the business of crops and poultry husbandry. She has been blessed with six children: three are married and the other three are single living together with her in their home.

Mrs. Tep would like to borrow her first loan from HKL to purchase a plowing machine. It will be used on her rice and potato farm as well as hired out to most of the villagers in her neighborhood during the rainy season. Mrs. Tep aims to raise more poultry and increase her rice output in the coming years.

loans.use: to purchase a plowing machine.

loans.name: Rosa Yesenia

texts.es:
Rosa Yesenia es una joven emprendedora de 20 años de edad, soltera y sin hijos, actualmente esta viviendo en casa de sus padres quienes actualmente se dedican a la agricultura y ganadería, la casa en la que vive está ubicada en el Caserío “Los Zapatas Lote 37” a unos 20 minutos del Dist. Tambogrande, el cual es perteneciente a la provincia de Piura, la misma que esta ubicada a unas 3 horas de la ciudad de Chiclayo, por ser una zona rural en la que vive Rosa aun no cuenta con el servicio básico de agua potable contando por ahora solo con el servicio de luz.

Rosa Yesenia se dedica de lunes a viernes  ala venta de cerveza, chicha de jora y piqueos en  su propio domicilio en el cual atiende junto a su madre siendo los días sábados, domingos y lunes, los que mas movimiento tienen por lo que trabajan desde las primeras horas hasta altas horas de la tarde, ya contando con cliente fija debido que se preocupan por la buena atención. Cuenta con todo el apoyo de sus padres debido que es ella quien ayuda al sustento diario del hogar.


Rosa Yesenia considera que para seguir creciendo en su negocio es necesario almacenar sus insumos por lo que urge obtener una refrigeradora que le permitirá almacenar sus alimentos y mantenerlos en buenas condiciones para lo que no cuenta con dinero disponible,  y es que se basa a sus necesidades para solicitar un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1200 Nuevos Soles con lo que podrá comprar su refrigeradora y así seguir creciendo con su negocio junto a sus padres.

Rosa Yesenia a pesar de ser una joven emprendedora a demostrado tener responsabilidad por salir adelante junto a sus padres, por lo que se ha ganado el respeto y consideración de todos los moradores del caserío en el que vive.
texts.en:
Rosa Yesenia, 20, is a young entrepreneur. She is single and doesn't have any children. Right now she lives at home with her parents who are farmers and cattle ranchers. There house is in the village Los Zapatas Lote 37, about 20 minutes from Tambogrande which is part of the province of Piura, and about 3 hours from Chiclayo. Because she lives in a rural area, Rosa still doesn't have potable water, and for now just has electricity.

Rosa Yesenia works Monday to Friday selling beer, chicha de jora [a fermented corn drink], and snacks out of her home, together with her mother. Saturdays, Sunday and Mondays there is more movement of goods so they work from very early until late in the afternoon. They already have an established clientele who expect good service. She has full support from her parents because she helps to cover their costs of living.

Rosa Yesenia thinks that to keep growing her business she needs to be able to store the ingredients. For that reason she wants to buy a refrigerator that will allow her to store her food and keep it in good condition. She doesn't have money available, which is why she needs to ask Edpyme Alternativa from a loan in the amount of 1200 nuevos soles with which she'll buy a refrigerator and keep increase her business with, together with her parents.

In spite of being a young entrepreneur, Rosa Yesenia has demonstrated herself to be responsible in helping her parents to progress, which has earned her the respect and consideration of all of her neighbors in the village.

loans.use: to buy a refrigerator to store her food so it stays in good condition.

loans.name: Merlyn

texts.en:
Merlyn is 45 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is married with six children. Merlyn has a retail shop that buys and sells canned goods, snacks and beverages. She has had this business for 10 years. She requested a loan of 5,000 Philippine pesos (PHP) to buy stock of canned goods, snacks and beverages.

Merlyn has been a member of HSPFI since 2011. In the future, Merlyn hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks and beverages to sell

loans.name: Ketty

texts.es: Ketty, de 35 años, es un mujer amable buena y emprendedora, hace algunos años se separó de su pareja, pero tiene  dos hijas, Wendy de 12 y Lleny de 8, a quienes tiene que cuidar. Desde entonces trabajar el doble para así poder brindar una mejor calidad de vida a ellas. Es así que todos los días se va muy temprano a realizar los arreglos para abrir en una mercado mayorista de la ciudad, ahí espera paciente a que vengan sus clientes en busca de productos regionales según la temporada en donde este. Lleva realizando este negocio por dos años y lo hace sola. Durante este tiempo vio la manera de cómo aumentar sus ingresos es así que al mismo tiempo vende plátanos y comida en su mismo puesto. Estas dos actividades le brindan buenos ingresos al día y con ellos puede llevar los productos necesarios y pagar algunas necesidades de su hogar. Espera seguir trabajando para hacer crecer aun más su negocio y mas adelante poner una tienda de abarrotes en su casa. Este será el primer préstamo con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado se compromete a ser un cliente responsable y puntual para no quedar mal con el banco comunal que le esta dando la confianza que necesitaba. Además espera acoplarse muy rápidamente y contagiarse del espíritu colaborador y solidarios de todos. Con el monto solicitado 800 soles, comprará plátanos al por mayor y los venderá al menudeo, además comprará ingrediente e insumos para seguir vendiendo comida en su puesto del mercado.
texts.en:
Ketty, 35 years old, is a good, friendly, and enterprising woman. She has been separated from her partner for a few years, but she has two daughters – 12 year old Wendy and 8 year old Lleny – who she has to take care of. Since then she works twice as much in order to give them a better quality of life. Each day she leaves very early to get groceries in order to open her stall in the major city market. There she patiently waits for her customers to come looking for seasonal local produce. She began this business two years ago, and she did it alone. During this time she saw that the way to increase income is to sell plantains and meals out of the same stall and at the same time. These two activities bring her good daily profit and with them she can get necessary products and pay for a few home necessities. She hopes to continue working in order to further grow her business and later on put a grocery store in her home. 

This will be her first loan with MFP, and so she hopes for their help in order to continue with her goals. She also promises to be a responsible and punctual client so as not to get a bad reputation with the communal bank that is giving her the trust that she needs. Furthermore she hopes to join up very quickly and spread the collaborative spirit and the solidarity of everyone. 

With the requested amount of 800 soles, she will buy plantains in bulk, and she will sell them retail. Also she will buy ingredients and supplies in order to continue selling food in her market stall.

loans.use: to buy plantains in bulk and ingredient to make meals.

loans.name: Leni

texts.es: Leni, de 44 años, es una mujer amable y muy trabajadora, está casada con Neptalí de 55 años quien es su inseparable esposo desde hace 20 años. Ella tiene cuatro hijos de los cuales dos ya son mayores y solo dos Divana de 14 y Diego de 15 años viven con ella en su casa propia en donde a diario les brinda lo mejor para que puedan ser personas de bien en adelante. Cuando cae la noche, sale a la vereda y habilita un espacio para colocar todos los ingredientes, insumos y sus demás materiales para iniciar con su negocio de venta de pollo broaster y salchipapas, van muchas personas aconsumir los alimentos que prepara y por ello aprovecha para vender bebidas gaseosas o refrescos preparados por ella misma. En el tiempo que lleva realizando´éste trabajo aprendió que siempre tiene que tener una sonrrisa en los labios y darle buen trato a sus clientes para que puedan ir contentos y volver mas adelante. Le esta yendo muy bien lo que hace ya que tiene muchos clientes que le generan buenas ventas y ganancias diarias. Espera seguir trabajando, pues tuvo cerca de 1 mes paralizado su negocio por motivos de salud, pero ahora esta mucho mejor y con ganas de salir  seguir con su negocio. Este será el primer préstamo con MFP, por tanto espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Con el monto solicitado 800 soles, comprará ingredientes e insumos para reiniciar con su negocio, además de algunos materiales que le hacen falta para poder empezar a trabajar con fuerza.
texts.en: Leni, 44 years old, is a very hardworking and friendly woman. She is married to Netali, 55 years old, who’s her inseparable spouse of 20 years. She has 4 children, 2 are grown and only 14 year old Divana and 15 year old Diego live with her in their home where every day she gives them the best so that they can be good people later on. When night falls, she goes out to the sidewalk and sets up a space in order to put out all the ingredients, supplies, and her other materials to begin doing business selling broasted chicken and fried potatoes with sausages. Lots of people eat the foods she makes, and she took the opportunity to sell sodas and prepared refreshment herself. In the time that she’s been doing this work she learned that she always has to have a smile on her face and give good service to her clients so that they will be satisfied and return in the future. She’s been doing very well since she has many clients who generate good sales and daily income. She hopes to continue working, since for one month she had to miss work for health reason, but now she is much better and with a desire to succeed she continues with her business. This will be her first loan with MFP. For that reason she hopes that with their partnership she can continue towards her goals. With the requested amount of 800 soles, she will buy ingredients and supplies to restart her business as well as some materials that she needs in start off on the right foot.

loans.use: to buy ingredients and perishable products.

loans.name: Christine

texts.en:
Christine is 26 years old and lives in the Philippines. She is single. 
Christine has a retail shop that buys & sells canned goods, snacks & beverages. She has had this business for 5 years. She requested a loan for 4,000 to buy stock of canned goods, snacks & beverages.
Christine has been a member of HSPFI since 2011.  In the future, Christine hopes to improve her business.

loans.use: to buy canned goods, snacks & beverages for sale

loans.name: Chan
