loans.name: Maribel

texts.es: La señora Maribel de 53 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su sobrino y un nieto. Ella se dedica a la confección y venta de variedad de ropa. Tiene aproximadamente 12 años de dedicarse a esta actividad por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia en el área y mucho reconocimiento en la zona donde ella habita. La confección de la ropa la hace dentro de su hogar de residencia aunque la venta la realiza de manera ambulante en diferentes áreas cercanas a su vecindario. Gracias a su dedicación y trabajo los resultados han sido favorables hasta el momento ya que con su esfuerzo  puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. El sueño de la señora Maribel es poder ver su negocio florecer de tal forma que eso le permita mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia. Ella se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora ya que tiene muchas ideas de negocios las culeas poco a poco va poniendo en marcha. Por el momento su deseo es enfocarse en la confección de prendas de vestir con el fin de dar el mejor servicio posible en la zona y convertirse en la mejor modista de la zona. Ha tomado la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de materia prima al por mayor (telas, hilos, elástico, tijeras, cintas, etc.) de tal forma que su negocio cuente con los insumos necesarios a la hora de que los clientes soliciten su servicio. De esta manera espera mejorar su nivel de ventas así como el nivel de ingresos que le conlleven a mejorar su calidad de vida y la de su familia.
texts.en:
Sra. Maribel is 53 years old and lives in her own house with her nephew and grandson. She earns her living by making and selling clothing. She’s been doing this work for approximately twelve years so has a lot of experience and is well-known in the area where she lives. She makes the clothing in her home although sells the items by walking around the different neighbourhoods close by. Because of her hard work and dedication, Maribel has done well and always managed to support her household. 

Maribel’s dream is to see her business flourish so that she can improve her own and her family’s standard of living. She is known as an enterprising woman as she has many business ideas which she is gradually putting into practice. For the time being she wishes to focus on making clothing with the goal of providing the best service possible in the region and then becoming the best dressmaker in the region.

Maribel has decided to approach INTEGRAL for a loan to buy wholesale items such as fabric, thread, elastic, scissors, belts etc. By purchasing these items, she will have on hand the supplies needed as soon as her customers place their order. She hopes to make more sales in this way and thus increase her income so she can provide a better life for herself and her family.

loans.use: to buy fabric, thread, elastic, scissors, belts etc.

loans.name: Wishnie Jean

texts.en:
Wishnie Jean is a married woman with two children. Wishnie Jean is 27 years old and resides at Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur, Philippines. Wishnie Jean owns and operates a farm, planting & harvesting coconuts for sale to earn a living and she's been 6 years in this business. Each month, she earns 8,000  PHP doing this type of business. She requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase fertilizers. 

Wishnie Jean is been a member of GDMPC for almost a year. In the future, Wishnie Jean wants to do renovations on her house and to see her children finish their studies.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers

loans.name: Maina

texts.en:
Maina is a 38-year-old married man. He has four children and all are enrolled in school. His wife's name is Florence and she works as a farmer. Maina operates a retail shop and sells his goods in that shop. He's worked in this business for seven years. His primary customers are local area residents. He describes his greatest business challenge to be seasonality and his highest monthly expense is food. He owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

Maina will use the Kes 100,000 loan to purchase more stocks of maize flour, wheat flour, detergents, rice, cooking oil and beans for resale. Maina aspires to establish a wholesale shop in the future. He joined Yehu to access funds to expand his business.

loans.use: To purchase more maize flour, wheat flour, detergents, rice, cooking oil and beans for resale.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is a 31-year-old married woman with three children; all of them are in school. She has had a business selling tea in Kator South Sudan for one year.

Sarah is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase sugar and coffee. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay school fees.

loans.use: to purchase sugar and coffee for sale.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 42-year-old married woman,  mother of three children. She started her own business in 2010, in order to help her husband in covering their expenses & earning their living. Mary is a hardworking woman, with an excellent reputation who seeks perfection in her business  & social life. That's why she applied for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua, in order to increase her business capital through buying big quantities at special prices and paying cash.

Mary sells tobacco, molasses, hookahs  (water pipes) & charcoal, in addition to sweets and mobile phones recharge cards. She is supported by most of her customers, because they enjoy communicating with her & they all love the way she works to fulfill her family's needs.

Mary hopes to expand her business more & more in the future so as to enter the wholesale trade.

loans.use: To increase her business capital through buying big quantities at special prices and paying cash

loans.name: Teymur

texts.en:
Teymur is a 29-year-old man, married with two children. He is an Internally Displaced Person and lives with his family in Bilasuvar IDP Settlement.   He breeds cows and other livestock and sells milk and milk products as well as cattle for meat purposes to local butchers. Teymur has more than six years of experience in this field, thanks to his father who taught him well how to look after cattle.

Teymur usually buys young livestock, raises and fattens them for 5-6 months, and resells them for more profitable price in the local livestock bazaar.  Milk and yoghurt he sells to the neighbors. Milk and meat selling brings in 300 AZN income per month. Milk and yoghurt, as well as meat are very popular products in Azerbaijan. People use meat in everyday national dishes as pilau and dolma and always use yoghurt sauce. Milk products are considered as very healthy and also present in everyday life.   

There is only one financial income in his family and it is not enough to cover the basic needs of his beloved children. Teymur applied for 1500 AZN to purchase three cattle, one milk cow and fodder.  This will be his 2nd from AqroInvest and Teymur has a good client history.

loans.use: to purchase three cattle, one milk cow and fodder

loans.name: Ian

texts.en:
Ian lives in the Cabungaan, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. He is 33 years old, married and has three children. To make a living, he owns and operates a farm whose main crop is bananas. Ian has been in his business for more than five years and gets 5,000 PHP a month.

 In 2008, Ian joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services that could improve his living standards and ability to engage in business activities. He is requesting a new loan of 10,000 PHP to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. He plans to use the additional revenue made possible by this loan to meet his growing family's basic needs.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: Oruc

texts.en:
Oruc is a 40-year-old man, married with one son. Oruc is an Internally Displaced Person. He has been raising fruits and vegetables for the last eight years. His father taught him the best experience in raising crops. 

Oruc usually sells his crop in the central market. People use fresh vegetables every day and consider them healthy; many national dishes are made of vegetable, like pilau and dolma. Fresh fruits serve every table in Azerbaijan family and also are used to make fresh punch.

Oruc would like to increase the number of products he sells and for this purpose he applied for a 1000 AZN loan. He will use the loan to purchase seeds and fertilizers. He has a positive loan history and this will be his 3rd loan.

loans.use: to  buy seeds and fertilizers

loans.name: Peter

texts.en: Peter is 47 years old, married with six children. He does carpentry to earn a living. He has been in the business for 14 years and has employed three people. Since he joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to save his income and hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 100,000 Kenya Shillings to buy timber.

loans.use: To buy timber

loans.name: Elsa

texts.en:
Elsa works hard to support her family. Elsa is married and has a tailoring business in the Philippines.

Elsa requested a PHP 17,000 loan through NWTF to buy more materials for her tailoring business.

Elsa has been in this business for 10 years now.

In the future, Elsa would like to save money to expand her business.

loans.use: To buy more materials for her tailoring business

loans.name: Rey

texts.en:
Rey is from Cabungaan Clarin, Misamis Occidental. He is 35 years old and is married. 

Rey owns & operates an agricultural business. He has been engaged in his business for eight years and earns approximately 6,000 PHP a month. In 2010, Rey joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and his ability to engage in business activities. He is requesting a new loan of 12,000 PHP which will be used to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise. 

Rey plans to use the additional revenue generated to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional seeds, seedlings & young crops to raise

loans.name: Albert

texts.en:
Albert is 59 years old and he lives in Vanadzor with his wife. His children are married and live separately from their parents. Albert has a higher education and for a long time he worked as a civil engineer. But as the salary was not enough to keep the family, Albert started his own business. 

Albert assembles fireplaces, barbecue places and "tonir"s (a stove in the soil, where Armenians bake bread and cook traditional Armenian dishes) out of bricks. He has been running his business over more than 15 years and thanks to his hard work, he has a very good reputation and high prestige in his occupation. Albert fulfills orders quickly and well and therefore he always has many clients. 

Albert is asking for a 300,000 AMD loan to buy a new machine-tool for his business. As Albert’s wife is jobless, Albert supports his family by himself, thanks to his business.

loans.use: to buy a new machine-tool for his business

loans.name: Consuelo

texts.es:
Consuelo, de 33 años es una mujer admirable, se casó con Aníbal, hace 16 años. Juntos tienen 2 hijos pequeños: Jersin y Kevin a los que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Yanamarca.  
El trabajo al que se dedica es la ganadería, cuenta con 4 vacas, las cuales produce la leche que comercializa a los productores de queso y yogurt que constantemente llegan a su casa. Al día saca un promedio de 4litros los cuales le ayudan a generar más ganancias. Además de sembrar cereales, cebada, cebolla, habas, quinua y papa. Los que cuida en compañía de su esposo que se encarga de quitar la maleza de entre los surcos, pues a veces malograr la calidad de los alimentos. Ya en la cosecha comercializa el fruto al mercado mayorista de la ciudad de Jauja y a veces a Huancayo todo depende del precio, ya que les conviene ganar más. Ahora desea mejorar la condición del establo donde cría a las vacas, pues se hace poco se murió una cría producto del frío de la madrugada. Ella pertenece al grupo “virgen maría” y este es el tercer crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias.
Consuelo de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos entre sus cultivos de cereales.
texts.en:
Consuelo, 33, is an admirable woman.  She married Aníbal 16 years ago.  Together they have two small children, Jersin and Kevin, for whom they care in their own house, located in the town of Yanamarca.

The work she does is ranching.  She has four cows that produce the milk she sells to the cheese and yogurt producers who constantly come to her house.  She gets an average of four liters a day, which helps her to generate more profit.

She also grows grain, barley, onion, beans, quinoa, and potatoes, which she tends with her husband, who is responsible for weeding the furrows because sometimes weeds damage the quality of the food.  Then, in the harvest, she sells the crop in the wholesale market in the city of Jauja and sometimes in Huancayo, depending on the price, because it's better to earn more.

Now she wants to improve the condition of the stable where she raises the cows because a little while ago a calf died from the early morning cold.

She belongs to the Virgen María group and this is her third loan with MFP.  She hopes for a small loan so she can achieve her goals.  On the other hand, she promises once again to make her payments punctually.  Also, it pleases her to be part of her association because all the members are responsible and supportive people.

If she gets her support, Consuelo will invest the requested money in buying natural fertilizers to spread on her grain crops.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Victoria

texts.es: Victoria, es una mujer tímida. Vive en compañía de Pedro su esposo y su hija Martha a la que cuidan en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Rundo. Ella vive junto a sus terrenos agrícolas en una casa rústica. Ahí dedicó su vida a la agricultura, principalmente a sembrar papa, olluco y maíz en cantidad, lo cual cuida diariamente junto  su esposo,, pues se distribuyen las acuidades en el cuidado de sus animales cuenta con vacas, cerdos, ovejas de las cuales obtiene ingresos extras. Ya que vende la leche que producen y comercializa a los cerdos y ovejas a los carniceros que llegan al anexo cada mes. A pesar de la lejanía del lugar se siente feliz, ya que estar en contacto con la naturaleza es lo que más le gusta y agrada. Por eso desea mejorar sus sembríos y seguir sembrando otras variedades de alimentos. Este es el décimo crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Victoria de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para nutrir sus sembríos de maíz y papa.
texts.en: Victoria, is a shy woman.  She lives with her husband, Pedro and her daughter, Martha.  They live in their own home, located in the town of Rundo.  They live on their farmland, in a rustic house.  There, she dedicates her life to agriculture, mainly growing potatoes, olluco, (a root vegetable grown in the Andean region of South America), and corn in bulk.  Together, Victoria and her husband care for the crops daily and share in the care of their cows, pigs, and sheep.  They earn extra income selling the milk produced by the cows and marketing the pigs and sheep to the butchers that come to Anexo each month.   Despite the remoteness of the place, she feels happy because she really enjoys being in touch with nature. For this reason, she wishes to improve her fields and continue sowing other varieties of food.  This is her tenth loan with MFP, and she is hoping for a small loan so that she may fulfill her goals.  Once more, she promises to make her payments on time.  In addition, she is pleased to be a part of the association because all of the members are responsible and share a feeling of solidarity.  Upon receiving her loan, Victoria will invest the amount requested in the purchase of organic fertilizer to nourish her corn and potato fields.

loans.use: to purchase sacks of fertilizer.

loans.name: Tomas

texts.es: Tomas vive en la localidad de Rundo junto a su esposa y sus 2 hijos a los cuales cuida con mucho amor y cariño, en su casa propia. Él es un hombre responsable, todas las mañanas desde muy temprano recorre los terrenos de cultivo que sembró con mucho esfuerzo. Como no tiene peones estables, limpia por horas la maleza que crece entre sus sembríos. Ya que depende mucho de eso su éxito en la cosecha. Pero como tiene que mantener a sus esposa e hijos, realiza también el trabajo de arado de la tierra, con los 2 toros que posee, “es muy cansado, pero obtengo buenas ganancias durante el día”, comenta. Mientras tanto su esposa cuida de sus hijos y de los animales que tiene como gallinas y cerdos, que les sirve de alimento, pero cuando tienen necesidades los comercializan a los carniceros que llegan a su anexo. Ahora desea comprar más terrenos de cultivo propios para sembrar en mayor cantidad. Este es el cuarto crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Tomas de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el préstamo en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos entre sus sembríos.
texts.en:
Tomas lives in the village of Rundo with his wife and two children whom he cares for with a lot of love and affection in his own home. He is a responsible man. 

Early every morning he goes over his cultivated land which he planted with a lot of effort. As he does not have stable workers, he must clean out the weeds that grow between his crops for hours. He depends a lot on the success of his harvest. Since he has to support his wife and children, he also plows the land with the two bulls that he owns. "It's very tiring, but I earn a lot of profits during the day," he says. Meanwhile, his wife takes care of the children and the animals she has like hens and pigs, which feed them. When they are in need they sell them to the butchers who come to their neighborhood. Now he wants to buy more farm land to plant more. 

This is his fourth loan with MFP and he hopes for a small loan to be able to meet his objectives. Additionally, he promises again to make his payments. He also appreciates being part of the communal bank because all of its members are responsible and united people. Upon receiving this support, Tomas will invest in the purchase of natural fertilizers to spread among his crops.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Orfelinda

texts.es: Orfelinda, de 38 años es una mujer trabajadora. Vive en compañía de Esteban, su esposo. Juntos tuvieron 5 hijos, pero solo cría a 2 de ellos en su casa propia ubicada en la localidad de Pampas. En un espacio de su casa construyó un huerto pequeño, donde siembra variedad de productos de buena calidad los cuales fertilizan con guano de isla, por lo que obtiene grandes y saludables alimentos de la tierra. Más adelante está pensando sembrar en terrenos más extensos y así obtener mayores ingresos. Ahora solo se limita a sembrar alverja, maíz, olluco y papa, en terrenos arrendados, ya que no cuenta con unos propios. Según cuenta alquila para todo el año, así ya no tendría que pagar mensualmente. Además cría ovejas que junto a la cosecha de sus alimentos comercializa a la feria de la ciudad. Pero cuando obtiene mayor cantidad, viaja a la capital del país para obtener mayor precio de compra.  Sus planes en la actualidad son ahorrar dinero para comprar sus propios terrenos. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario Nuevo Horizonte y este es el octavo crédito con MFP, donde espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete una vez más cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su asociación porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Orfelinda de recibir su apoyo; invertirá elC dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcir entre sus sembríos de olluco y papa.
texts.en: Orfelinda is 38 years old. She is a hard-working woman. She lives with Esteban, her husband. They had five children together but they only raise two of them in their own house located in the city of Pampas. In one area of the house, she built a small garden where she grows a variety of good quality products. She fertilizes them with island guano manure from which she obtains healthy and big produce from the soil. In the future, she is thinking about planting in more extensive plots of land in order to earn greater profits. Currently, she only plants peas, corn, olluco (ulluco) and potatoes on rented plots since she doesn’t have her own plots. She rents them for the entire year, so she does not have to pay monthly. She also raises sheep. Along with her produce harvest, she sells them at the city fair. However, when she has a greater quantity of food, she travels to the capital of the country to get a better buying price. Her plans for now are to save money in order to purchase her own plots. She belongs to the New Horizon (Nuevo Horizonte) communal bank. This is the eighth loan with MFP and she hopes that with this small loan she can achieve her objectives. On the other hand, she promises once again to complete her payments. In addition, she is grateful to be a part of her association because all of the members are responsible and supportive people. Orfelinda will invest the requested money in the purchase of natural fertilizers to spread between her ullucos and potatoes.

loans.use: purchase natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Ilma

texts.es: Ilma es una joven muy trabajadora de 26 años de edad, vive con su pareja Jhonny de 27 años, en la casa que durante 03 años de convivencia adquirieron comprarla ambos. Desde hace 16 años por principios de la vida, ella se dedica a labrar la tierra para después cultivar plantas de cacao, a inicios lo hacia con la ayuda de sus padres;  porque no tenia su propia terreno de siembras, ahora que vive junto a su pareja, sus padres le heredaron un terreno en la cual ella  con algunos ingresos de su pareja lograron comprar sus plantas de cacao para sembrarlas  y así tener buenas ganancias  para el sustento de su nuevo hogar. De esa manera con las cosechas de sus frutos lograron elaborar la construcción de su hogar, así como también comprando plantas de cacao para cultivarlas. A ella le gusta dedicarse a la agricultura, asimismo verlas sin malezas que afecten su sembrío. Con el tiempo desea en agrandar su producción y de esa manera mejorar su calidad de vida. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP, y será muy responsable como siempre, además está conforme con el trabajo de su banco comunal porque son personas responsables. Con los 1,000 nuevos soles, comprarán abono para realizar el mantenimiento de su chacra.
texts.en:
Ilma is a 26-year-old hardworking young woman. She has lived with her partner Jhonny, who is 27 years old, in a house they bought together. 

For 16 years, since the beginning of her life, she has made a living working the land to be able to plant cacao plans. Originally she did this with help from her parents because she did not have her own farm land. Now that she lives with her partner, her parents have given her a plot of land where, with some income from her partner, they have be able to buy some cacao plants to plant and in that make make a good income to support their new home. In this way they have been able to build a home with the income from their work and buy cacao plants to grow. 

She likes working in agriculture and seeing her crops free of weeds which can affect her plants. Over time she wants to increase her production and in that way improve her quality of life. This will be her second loan with MFP and she will be very responsible, as always. Additionally, she is very committed to the work of her communal bank because they are responsible people. 

With the 1,000 nuevos soles, they will buy manure to maintain their little farm.

loans.use: to buy sacks of manure.

loans.name: Robertina

texts.es: Robertina es una mujer de lucro, tiene 35 años de edad;  vive en su propia casa junto a su esposo  Marcial de 36 años y sus 05 hijos. Al igual que la mayoría de los pobladores agricultores de la localidad de Palmapampa, Robertina, también es una mujer que se dedica a la agricultura; cuya labor es arar la tierra para luego poder cultivar plantas de cacao. Lleva 5 años laborando  esta actividad y en tiempos de cosecha cuenta con el apoyo de su esposo y jornaleros, de esa manera llegan a extraer rápido los  frutos; para luego ser comercializadas  a los centros de acopio de su localidad. Por otro lado su mayor dificultad es no poder combatir con las plagas que aquejan su producción. Su mayor anhelo es incrementar mas plantas de cacao para tener mayor producción y así un buen sustento económico. Este será su crédito número 08 con MFP y sabe que si es responsable seguirá contando con posteriores créditos que le permita crecer en sus cultivos. En su banco comunal es una socia participe en las actividades que realizan.  Con los 3,000 nuevos soles, comprará insumos químicos para fumigar sus plantas de cacao.
texts.en: Robertina is a successful woman. She is 35 years old and lives in her own house together with her husband, Marcial, who is 36 years old, and their 5 children. Like the majority of the agricultural population in the area of Palmapampa, Robertina is also a woman who works in agriculture. Her work is plowing the land so that she can then grow cacao plants. She has been doing this work for 15 years, and at harvest time she has the help of her husband and hired laborers. In this way they can harvest the fruits rapidly so that they can be sold at the collection centers in their area. On the other hand, her great difficulty is not being able to combat the scourges that afflict her production. Her great desire is to increase the number of cacao plants to have greater production and thus good economic support. In her communal bank she is a member who participates in the activities they carry out. With the 3000 PEN, she will buy chemical ingredients to fumigate her cacao plants.

loans.use: to buy chemical products to fumigate her cacao plants

loans.name: Ana

texts.es: Ana, de 46 años es una madre ejemplar. Vive en compañía de Jorge, su esposo desde hace 14 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos de los cuales solo vive con 2 de ellos: Jorge y Keyla a los que cuida en una casa alquilada en la localidad de Huachac. Su progreso comenzó desde hace 5 años, cuando intensificó sus actividades agrícolas, mejorando sus sembríos de papa, maíz y quinua. Diariamente prepara sus terrenos de cultivos para  esta época de siembra, cuenta que la falta poco para cosechar maíz a los comerciantes que llegan a su propios terrenos. Durante esta campaña tuvo que alquilar parcelas con regadillo para nutrir los alimentos. Recibe el apoyo de su esposo quien es docente en una escuela, trabaja durante las mañanas y por las tardes ayuda a su esposa en el cuidado de sus ganados que alimenta de la alfalfa que ella misma cultiva. De esa manera vende la leche que produce a terceras personas que conocen de su calidad. Durante este tiempo de trabajo ha visto los frutos de su constancia, tiene más vacas y 2 toros con los que hace ara la tierra. Esta convencida que  logrará mejores beneficios económicos por lo que se ha propuesto para más adelante tener un establo ganadero. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “mujeres trabajadoras” y este es el noveno crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Ana de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos entre sus sembríos de quinua y alfalfa que tiene.
texts.en:
Ana, 46, is an exemplary mother.  She lives with Jorge, her husband of 14 years.  Together they have three children, of whom only two live with them: Jorge and Keyla, for whom they care in a rented house in the community of Huachac.

Her progress began five years ago when she intensified her farming activities, improving her potato, corn, and quinoa fields.  She prepares her crop fields daily during this planting season.  She says that she needs little to harvest corn for the merchants who come to her own land.

During this campaign she had to rent plots of land with irrigation to nourish the food.  She receives help from her husband, who is a teacher in a school.  He works in the morning and in the afternoon helps his wife care for the livestock that feeds on the alfalfa that she herself grows.  In this way she sells the milk she produces to other people who know its quality.

In this time of working she has seen the fruits of her perseverance.  She has more cows, and two bulls with which she plows the land.  She is convinced that she will get better economic benefits from what she has proposed so later she will have a livestock stable.

She belongs to the Mujeres Trabajadoras solidarity group and this is her ninth loan with MFP, for which she hopes for your collaboration so she can continue with her objectives.  On the other hand, she promises to make her payments punctually.  Also, it pleases her to be part of her communal bank because all the members are responsible and supportive people.

If she receives her support, she will invest the requested money in buying natural fertilizers to spread among her quinoa and alfalfa crops.

loans.use: to buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Flor

texts.es: Flor, de 25 años es una joven ejemplar. Vive en compañía de su mamá y sus 2 hermanos a los que apoya en su casa propia, ubicada en la localidad de Huachac. Hace un año su papá falleció, desde entonces afrontó sola los problemas del hogar. Trabaja ayudando a su madre en la actividad que aprendió desde muy niña, la agricultura. Durante las mañanas estudia la carrera profesional de Contabilidad. Ya por las tardes cuida de sus sembríos de maíz, papa y alverja, los que realiza en las 2 parcelas que tiene su familia. Pero cuenta que en esta campaña agrícola que sembró en mayor cantidad tuvo que alquilar más terrenos agrícolas. Ya en la cosecha los comercializa en el mercado de la ciudad de Tambo. Agradece a su mamá, que le da fuerzas para terminar su carrera, ella cuida de los animales que poseen, cuenta con varias vacas que producen leche, las cuales comercializa a un proveedor que realiza queso, ahí obtienen buenos ingresos diarios que minimizan los gastos del hogar. Ella pertenece al grupo solidario “mujeres luchadora” y este es el primer crédito con MFP, donde espera de su colaboración, para continuar con sus objetivos. Por otro lado promete cumplir con el pago de sus cuotas. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal porque  todos sus integrantes son personas responsables y solidarias. Flor de recibir su apoyo; invertirá el dinero solicitado en la compra de fertilizantes naturales para esparcirlos entre sus cultivos de quinua y maíz.
texts.en:
Twenty-five year old Flor, is an exemplary young person. She lives with her mother and two brothers, who she supports in her own home, located in Huachac. Her father died a year ago. Since then, she has faced the household problems by herself. She works in agriculture with her mother, an activity  that she learned as a very young child.

In the mornings, she studies accounting. And in the afternoons, she takes care of her fields of corn, potatoes and peas that she grows in the two parcels of land that her family has. She tells us that in this agricultural season she planted a larger quantity and had to rent two more parcels of land. After the harvest, she sells the vegetables in the market in the city of Tambo. She is grateful for her mother, who gives her the strength to finish her degree. Her mother takes care of the animals that they own. They have various cows that produce milk, which they sell to a cheese supplier. They earn a good daily income from this, which helps minimize the household expenses. 

Flor belongs to the communal group "mujeres luchadora" (fighting women) and this is her first loan with MFP, where she hopes that her contribution will help her further her objectives. On the other hand, she promises to follow through with completing her payments. Furthermore, it pleases her to be a part of a communal bank, as all of the members are responsible and supportive people. If Flor receives this loan, she will invest the money in the purchase of natural fertilizers, which she will spread among her quinoa and corn.

loans.use: buy natural fertilizers.

loans.name: Karina

texts.es: Karina, de 33 años de edad, es una mujer trabajadora y decidida, además de ser alegre y amable. Es conviviente con Cristian, quien se dedica a  operador de maquinaria pesada y es padre de sus dos hijos. Juntos habitan su propia casa en compañía de su hermana. La actividad que realiza Karina es la venta de ropas para damas, caballeros y niños de diversos modelos. Mercadería que es adquirida en la ciudad de Lima, gracias al apoyo de su amiga quien vive allá, pues ella realiza las compras y se las envía, y luego Karina las vende entre sus familiares, amistades y vecinos, a quines atiende de manera amable, logrando ganarse su preferencia. Tiene más de 03 años dedicándose a éste negocio, y hasta el momento lo realiza sola. Le gusta su negocio pues le genera un ingreso económico y tener una ocupación, además de estar en casa y el tiempo libre que lo emplea en el cuidado de su hijo. Considera su negocio bastante rentable por las ganancias  que le deja, y por tanto desea aumentar su stock de mercaderías, así logrará hacer crecer su negocio. Por otro lado, comenta que tiene conocimientos en costura, teniendo planes de comprarse una maquina de coser e incursionar en este negocio, de esa manera generarse más ingresos económicos. Este será el préstamo número 06 con la institución MFP. Está muy contenta de  saber que tendrá un apoyo financiero, ya que así se sentirá segura de avanzar con su negocio. Por otro lado se siente a gusto con su banco comunal, pues  considera un grupo unido y solidario. Con el monto solicitado de 800 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de un mayor número de ropa de diversos modelos, para tener un stock disponible para la venta, por lo que espera conseguirlos a menos precio por su compra en mayor volumen.
texts.en:
Karina, 33, is a hardworking and determined woman, in addition to being happy and pleasant.  She lives with Cristian, who works as a heavy-machinery operator and is the father of their two children.  Together they live in their own house with her sister.

The work Karina does is selling various styles of clothing for women, men, and children.  She gets her merchandise in the city of Lima, thanks to the help of her friend who lives there, because she makes the purchases and sends them.  Later Karina sells them to her family members, friends, and neighbors, whom she serves in a friendly manner, managing to earn their loyalty.  She has been working in this business for more than three years, and up to the present she has done it alone.

She likes her business because it generates an income for her and she has an occupation, besides being at home and using her free time to care for her child.  She considers her business to be very profitable because of the profits it gives her.  She wants to increase her stock of merchandise so she will manage to make her business grow.  On the other hand, she comments that she has knowledge of sewing, and has plans to buy herself a sewing machine and make incursions into this business, and so generate more income for herself.

This will be her sixth loan with the MFP institution.  She is very happy to know that she will have financial help because in this way she will feel secure about making progress with her business.  On the other hand, she feels comfortable with her communal bank because she considers them a close and supportive group.

With the requested sum of 800 PEN she will invest in buying a greater quantity of clothing in various styles to have stock available for sale.  She hopes to get them at a lower price for buying in large quantities.

loans.use: to buy more articles of clothing.

loans.name: María Fémina

texts.es: La señora María Fémina de 53 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su compañero de vida de 67 años el cual se dedica a la agricultura. La señora María ha trabajado durante mucho tiempo en un puesto en el mercado Municipal de la zona donde ella habita en el cual vende variedad de productos de primera necesidad y cereales. Gracias a Dios y a su esfuerzo ha logrado posicionar su negocio el cual cuenta con mucho prestigio y accesibilidad, es un negocio bien establecido el cual muchas personas frecuentan ya que en el siempre encuentran lo que buscan. La señora María es muy conocida y muchas personas dan buenas referencias de ella ya que se caracteriza por ser una mujer emprendedora y dedicada a su trabajo. Ha tomado la decisión de  invertir en su negocio, con el fin de mantenerlo surtido y pueda atraer a más clientes que le permitan aumentar su nivel de ventas  e ingresos, de tal forma que pueda lograr accesar a mejores condiciones de vida. Esto la ha hecho tomar la decisión de solicitar este credito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de productos tales como: arroz, azúcar, frijoles, maíz, jabón, aceite, papel, huevos, sal y de mas productos atractivos para los clientes. Confía que de esta manera lograra alcanzar su sueño.
texts.en:
María Fémina is 53 years old and lives in her own home together with her 67-year-old life partner who is a farmer.  María has been working for a long time on a stall in the town market in her area.  She sells a variety of basic household products and cereals.  Thanks to God and her own hard work, she has managed to position her business in the market.  It has a good reputation and is very accessible.  It is a well-established business and many people come to it because they always find what they are looking for.  María is very well known and many people provide good references for her because she is noted for being an entrepreneurial woman who is committed to her work.  She has taken the decision to invest in her business so that she can keep it well stocked and attract more customers.  This will allow her to increase her sales levels and her income, thereby enabling her to enjoy better living conditions.

María has decided to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her business, buying products such as rice, sugar, beans, corn, soap, oil, paper, eggs, salt and other products her customers would like.  She believes that this will enable her to achieve her dream.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, beans, corn, soap, oil, toilet paper, eggs, salt, etc.

loans.name: Sozhida

texts.ru: Сожида трудолюбивая и добросовестная женщина. Она замужем и любящая мать троих детей. Муж уехал на заработки в Россию. Более 22 лет она занимается купле- продажей семечек и за счет этого она содержит семью. В бизнесе помогают дети. Кроме этого у нее сад с 10-ю деревьями миндального ореха. Доход от продажи миндаля также помогает ей  в содержание семьи. Сожида хотела бы получить займ в размере 7000 Сомони для покупки семечек на продажу. Она надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Sozhida is a hard-working and conscientious woman. She is married and is a loving mother of three children. Her husband has gone to work in Russia. For over 22 years, Sozhida has been reselling sunflower seeds, and this is how she supports her family. Her children help out with the business. Sozhida also has a garden with 10 almond trees, and the profits from selling almonds also help her family. Sozhida would like to obtain a loan of 7000 somoni to buy sunflower seeds for resale. She is hoping for your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy sunflower seeds for resale

loans.name: Vuqar

texts.en:
Vuqar is a 43-year-old man, married with two children. He is an Internally Displaced Person and lives with his family in Bilasuvar IDP Settlement.  He sells different kinds of products. He sells foodstuff like candies, cookies, butter, macaroni as well as hair color and some cosmetic stuff. He has five years of experience in this field and gained necessary skills and knowledge for business. 

The products he sells are very popular in Azerbaijan and fly off the shelves. Vuqar`s business brings him in 230 AZN in profit. It is hard to keep satisfied customers with this income, because Vuqar needs to put aside some savings and can’t put all the income back into the business again. This is the only financial source in his family. 

He needs to expand his business and for this purpose he applied for 1000 AZN loan. He will use the loan to purchase more merchandise for his shop. This will be the 2rd loan from AqroInvest CU to Vuqar and he has a good client history.

loans.use: to purchase more foodstuffs

loans.name: Khushbakht

texts.ru: Хушбахт активный и трудолюбивый парень. Более 4 лет он занимается изготовлением ворот и дверей из стали, данный бизнес он унаследовал от дедушки. Его отец уехал на заработки в  Российскую Федерацию. Его мать и брат с сестрой безработные. Несмотря на свои молодые годы Хушбахт содержит свою семью, так как его отец ещё не нашел  постоянную работу. Хушбахт в свои 21 лет уже стал хорошим мастером-слесарем. Запрашивает займ для покупки сырья для производства дверей и окон, чтобы расширить свой бизнес. Мечтает получить хорошую прибыль, чтобы поступить в ВУЗ. Он надеется на вашу помощь и доброту.
texts.en: Khushbakht is an active and hardworking young man.  He has been involved in manufacturing gates and doors from steel for over four years and inherited this business from his grandfather.  His father left to work in the Russian Federation, and his mother and brother are unemployed.  Despite his young age, Khushbakht support his family because his father has not yet been able to find a permanent job.  At 21 years old, Khushbakht already became a good, skilled metalworker.  He is requesting this loan to purchase raw materials for manufacturing doors and windows in order to expand his business.  He dreams of making a good profit to get accepted to a university.  He relies on your help and kindness.

loans.use: to buy raw materials

loans.name: James

texts.en: James is a 27-year-old married man. His wife's name is Gladys and she works as a shopkeeper. James operates a garage. He's worked in this business for four years. His primary customers are the local area residents. He describes his greatest business challenge to be seasonality; his highest monthly expense is food. He owns a house that has electricity but no piped water. James will use the 50,000 KES loan to purchase more motor vehicle spare parts for his business. James aspires to expanding his business in the future. He joined Yehu to access funds to expand his business.

loans.use: To purchase motor vehicle spare parts

loans.name: Liliana Patricia

texts.es:
Liliana con su credikiva surtió su negocio de miscelanea con mercancias y quedó muy satisfecha con la inversión que hizo, así mismo logró comprar mecatos, cervezas, gaseosas y otros refrescos , su negocio se ve mucho mas organizado en el manejo del efectivo y cumple sus compromisos a satisfacción; con sus ahorros y ganancias, se incrementaron sus ventas y con su capital pudo comprar un lote y planea construir allí su vivienda poco a poco, porque este es un anhelo familiar, por eso se propone seguir haciendo préstamos a Kiva y lógicamente quedarle bien en los pagos. En la actualidad está aplicando a un nuevo credikiva, con el que comprará refrescos y bebidas en mayor cantidad; ella aprovechará el carnaval que se acerca para hacer la mejor venta del año y con esta inversión ganar mucho mas.
 Su mensaje a los financiadores de Kiva es el siguiente: “Que sigan apoyandonos con los cerditos que gracias a ellos podemos salir adelante“.
texts.en:
Liliana stocked her business with her Kiva loan and was very happy with the investment she made. She was able to buy beer, soft drinks and other beverages, as well as packed lunches. Her business is looking much more organized in the handling of cash and she is fulfilling her obligations satisfactorily. With her savings and income, her sales went up, and with her capital she was able to buy a plot of land. She is planning to construct her living quarters there little by little because this is a family aspiration. Thus she believes she will continue to take out Kiva loans and, logically, to keep making the payments as required. 

Currently she is applying for a new Kiva loan with which to purchase soft drinks and other beverages in greater quantities. She will take advantage of the upcoming Carnival to make her best sales of the year, and with this investment she will earn much more. Her message to Kiva lenders is the following: "I hope you'll keep supporting us with the loans because, thanks to them, we can get ahead."

loans.use: to purchase soft drinks at wholesale

loans.name: Germán Alfredo

texts.es: Germán Alfredo de 47 años de edad, habita junto a su grupo familiar el cual está integrado por su esposa y dos hijos menores de edad. El se dedica a la reparación de productos electrónicos. La ubicación del negocio es muy estratégica ya que se encuentra en el centro de la ciudad donde el habita. Tiene 23 años de tener este negocio por lo que ya cuenta con mucha experiencia y algunos clientes fijos y eventuales. Para él lo más importante es su familia y es quien le da energía para levantarse día con día a atender su negocio. Su sueño es poder mejorar sus condiciones de vida y las de su familia por lo que ha decidido mejorar el servicio de su negocio con el fin de atraer a más clientes que le generen un aumento en sus ingresos y poder así dar a su familia una  mejor calidad de vida. Esto lo ha hecho tomar la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de herramientas y aparatos electrónicos usados para repararlos y ponerlos a la venta ya que de esta manera es como él se gana la vida y puede llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Espera tener resultados favorables, confía en Dios que de esta forma logrará alcanzar el sueño  de mejorar las condiciones de vida de él y de su familia.
texts.en:
47-year-old Germán Alfredo lives together with his family (his wife and two dependent children).  His business is repairing electrical goods.  His business is in a very strategic location as it is in the city center.  He has been in the business for 23 years and so he has a lot of experience and both regular and occasional customers.  For Germán, the most important thing is his family as they give him the energy he needs to get up every day and work in his business.  His dream is to improve his family's living conditions as well as his own.  He has decided to improve his business so that he can attract more customers which will increase his income so that he can provide his family with a better quality of life.

Germán has taken the decision to request a loan from INTEGRAL to invest in his business.  He will buy tools and used electrical appliances so that he can repair them and then sell them, as this is how he earns a living and it enables him to provide his household with their daily bread.  He hopes to obtain favorable results and trusts in God that he will manage to fulfill his dream of improving his family's living conditions.

loans.use: to buy tools and used electrical appliances

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is a 50-year-old man on pension. He is an IDP (internally displaced person) who lives in Bilasuvar IDP Settlement with his wife and son. He is a farmer who has raised seasonal fruits and vegetables for the last 10 years. He chose this business because it is profitable, and fresh crops are often in high demand. People use fresh vegetables every day and consider them healthy. Many national dishes such as pilau and dolma are made of vegetables. Fresh fruits serve every table in Azerbaijan and are also used to make fresh punch.

Ali sells his crop in the Bilasuvar central bazaar. His monthly income is 230 AZN. His wife actively helps him to raise the crops. As his products are in high demand, Ali wants to expand his business and produce more fruits and vegetables to be able to meet the demand. For this purpose he applied for a loan of 1,000 AZN. He will buy new garden tools, seeds, and fertilizers.

loans.use: to buy more garden tools, seeds, and fertilizers

loans.name: Ma. Luz

texts.en: Ma. Luz is a married woman from Trinidad, Bohol. She has two children, ages 8 and 6. Ma. Luz and her husband run a fishing business. She sells her husband's catch at the market. Ma. Luz works hard to improve their business and take care of their children. She requested this loan to buy a fishing boat. This will help Ma. Luz's family immensely. In the future, Ma. Luz hopes for her children to finish college and be successful.

loans.use: to buy a fishing boat

loans.name: Mwanaasha

texts.en:
Mwanaasha, a 35-year-old divorced woman, has been operating a café for four years, neighbors and friends being her primary customers. Mwanaasha describes her greatest business challenge to be seasonality, while her highest monthly expense is food. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water.

Having joined Yehu to access funds to expand her business, Mwanaasha will use the Kes 20,000 loan to purchase more stocks of maize flour, wheat flour, rice, beans and cooking oil for her business. She aspires to establish a hotel in the future.

loans.use: to purchase more stocks of maize flour, wheat flour, rice, beans and cooking oil for her business.

loans.name: Alcides

texts.es: Alcides de 33 años de edad, habita junto a su grupo familiar el cual está conformado por su esposa de 42 años y un sobrino de 16 años el cual se encuentra estudiando. Él se dedica a la compra y venta de variedad de especies. Los cuales son productos alimenticios a base de vinagre, coliflor, repollo, remolacha, cebolla, entre otros, que el prepara con mucha paciencia para luego venderlos en tiendas y mercados. La venta de las especies las realiza de manera ambulante en las diferentes zonas del lugar donde vive. Tiene 3 años de dedicarse a esta actividad y por el momento los resultados obtenidos han sido muy favorables ya que le han permitido llevar el pan de cada día a su hogar. Él señor Alcides es muy trabajador y responsable muchas personas compran su producto ya que él ofrece calidad, higiene y buenos precios. Ha pensado mucho en cómo hacer crecer su negocio y ha llegado a la conclusión que lo mejor sería invirtiendo en la compra de los insumos necesarios al por mayor de tal forma que pueda aumentar su capacidad de venta y así poder cubrir una mayor demanda. Por lo tanto solicita este crédito a INTEGRAL para poder llevar a cavo su idea de invertir en su negocio en la compra de los insumos necesarios como: zanahorias, vinagre, cebollas, coliflor, jalapeños, remolacha, repollo, etc. y de esta manera espera y confía en Dios y en su trabajo que logrará buenos resultados que le permitirán dar a su familia mejores oportunidades de vida.
texts.en: 33-year-old Alcides lives together with his family (his 42-year-old wife and a 16-year-old nephew who is in school).  His business is buying and selling a variety of spices.  He sells vinegar-based food products: cauliflower, cabbage, beets, onion, etc. which he prepares with a lot of patience and then sells in stores and markets.  He sells his spices as an itinerant vendor in different nearby areas.  He has been in this business for three years and his results have been very favorable as they have allowed him to provide his household with their daily bread.  Alcides is very hard-working and responsible.  Many people buy his products as he offers good quality, hygiene and good prices.  He has thought a lot about how to grow his business and has reached the conclusion that the best thing would be to invest in buying the supplies that he needs wholesale.  This will enable him to increase his sales capacity and deal with greater demand.  He is requesting this loan from INTEGRAL so that he can carry out his plan of investing in his business, buying the supplies he needs such as carrots, vinegar, onions, cauliflower, jalapeños, beets, cabbage, etc.  He trusts in God and believes that, through his work, he will obtain good results which will enable him to provide his family with better opportunities in life.

loans.use: to buy carrots, vinegar, onions, cauliflower, jalapeños, beets, cabbage, etc.

loans.name: María De Los Ángeles

texts.es: María de los Ángeles de 46 años de edad, habita en casa de su propiedad junto con su esposo. Ella se dedica a la venta de plantas ornamentales desde hace varios años. Posee excelentes referencias  de sus vecinos ya que es muy conocida por su trabajo y dedicación al mismo. La ubicación de su negoción es en su hogar de habitación, el cual se encuentra en una zona muy estratégica y transitada. Ha estado pensando en la posibilidad de aumentar la oferta de sus hermosas plantas ya que desea abarcar una  mayor porción de mercado, es decir, tener la capacidad para cubrir una mayor demanda. Esto la ha llevado a tomar la decisión de solicitar este crédito a INTEGRAL para invertir en su negocio en la compra de variedad de plantas ornamentales que le permitan a traer a mas clientes y poder así cumplir su sueño de mejorar su nivel de ventas así como su nivel de ingresos de tal forma que poco a poco vaya teniendo acceso a mejor calidad de vida.
texts.en:
María de los Ángeles, age 46, lives in her own home with her husband. She has sold ornamental plants for several years.
She has excellent references from her neighbours, since she is very well-known for her work and for her dedication to her job. Her business is located in her home, which is in a very strategic, high-traffic area. She has been thinking about increasing her stock of beautiful plants, since she wants to capture a larger part of the market; that is, to be able to serve a higher demand. This has brought her to the decision to request this loan from INTEGRAL to invest in her business, buying a variety of ornamental plants. This will allow her to attract more customers and achieve her dream of improving her sales and income. This way, she will be able to access a better quality of life, bit by bit.

loans.use: to buy a variety of ornamental plants.

loans.name: Sahil

texts.en:
Sahil is a 28-year-old man, who is married and has three children.  He is an internally displaced person (IDP) and lives in Bilasuvar IDP Settlement. Sahil has bred cattle and cows for the last three years. After several attempts to find a job, he gave up and decided to start his own business. With the help of his wife, he purchased his first cattle.

Sahil usually buys small calves, raises and fattens them for 5-6 months, and then resells them for a profit in the livestock bazaar. His monthly income is 200 AZN and this business is only one source of income for his family. Beef is in very high demand in Azerbaijan and people use it in everyday dishes like pilau and dolma. Sahil also keeps milking cows for personal use and for selling to neighbors.  

Sahil wants to expand his business and improve living conditions for his family. He applied for a loan of 1,000 AZN to purchase one milking cow, two calves, and fodder.  This will be his fourth loan from AqroInvest CU and he has a good client history.

loans.use: to buy one milking cow, two calves, and fodder.

loans.name: Julie

texts.en:
Julie is from Panay Diot, Clarin, Misamis Occidental. She is 29 years old, married, and has one child. 

To make a living, Julie owns and operates a motor transport services business. She has been engaged in her business for six years and earns 8,000 PHP a month. In 2009, Julie joined GDMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve her living situation and ability to engage in business activities.

Julie is requesting a new loan of 15,000 PHP, which she will use to purchase additional vehicle spare parts. She plans to use the additional revenue generated from her business to improve the general living conditions of her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional vehicle spare parts.

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is 40 years old, married, and has three children, one of whom is in school. She has had a business of selling bread in Kator, South Sudan for two years.

Amina is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase bread for resale. She will use the extra income she earns as a result of this loan to pay school fees.

loans.use: to purchase bread for resale.

loans.name: Joyce

texts.en: Joyce, a 30-year-old married woman with four children, all attending school, has operated a business selling clothes in Kator, South Sudan for five years. Now requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase more clothes for resale, she will use the resulting additional income to buy a car in the future.

loans.use: to purchase clothes for resale.

loans.name: Marcos

texts.en:
Marcos, a 45-year-old farmer from Trinidad, Bohol, is a married man with three children. Marcos has been growing and selling rice for more than 10 years, arising early each morning to work on his land. He also has some workers who help till his land. Marcos earns 7000 PHP per month.

Now requesting a loan to purchase fertilizers and pay for labor, Marcos hopes to earn more and save for his children's education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizers and pay for labor.

loans.name: Margaret

texts.en:
Margaret is 40 years old and married to Genson. They are blessed with five children. Margaret owns rental houses in the area of Kingstone Nairobi. She has been in this business for the last 12 years and gets an income of KES 10,000 per month.

Margaret is applying for her first loan of KES 20,000 from KADET LTD, which she plans to use to buy materials to build more rental houses. She will use the anticipated profit to educate and give her children a better life.

Margaret hopes to own more rental plots as well as have a family farm.

loans.use: To buy materials for building rental houses

loans.name: Margarita

texts.en: Margarita is an entrepreneur from Trinidad, Bohol. She makes rice cakes, pancakes, and other food items that she sells to her community. Margarita also started raising pigs to help augment her income. She had a small pigpen built in her backyard. Margarita works hard to support her family. She plans to use her loan to buy flour, sugar, piglets, and feed. Margarita hopes to succeed in her ventures.

loans.use: to buy flour, sugar, piglets, and feed

loans.name: Wilfredo

texts.es: El señor Wilfredo nació, en la provincia Quijarro de la ciudad de Potosí  Radica en la  localidad de  el torno,  es casado con la señora Irma por mas de doce año tiene cinco hijos que se encuentran estudiando,  viven en la casa de su suegra, el trabaja en la extracción de áridos en el rio pirai vendiendo  material de construcción a las distintas empresas constructoras y también  tiene su pequeña parcela que recién esta empezando a sembrar, su esposa trabaja en la venta de productos balanceados en el mercado de la zona todos los días. El cliente es antiguo ya que se encuentra pasando por la 14º secuencia, el crédito que esta solicitando es para el mantenimiento de su camioneta y comprar más mercadería para ampliar el negocio de su esposa. El se encuentra muy agradecido con la institución ya que siempre le han ayudado en  el momento mas preciso y nunca  se  les pone trabas, además es bastante rápido, eficiente.
texts.en: Wilfredo was born in Potosí, Quijarro Province. He lives in the town of Torno. He’s been married to his wife, Irma, for more than 12 years and they have 5 children who are currently studying. They live in his mother-in-law’s house. He works extracting gravel from the Pirai river to sell as construction material to all the different construction companies and he has a parcel of land that he’s starting to sow. His wife sells animal feed in the local market every day. Wilfredo is an old client and has been through 14 loan cycles. The loan he is requesting is for the maintenance of his truck and to buy more merchandise to expand his wife’s store. He’s very grateful to the institution since they’ve always helped him at just the right moment and never add obstacles and they’re quick and efficient.

loans.use: For the purchase of corn and soy for his wife's store and the maintenance of his truck.

loans.name: Lourdes

texts.es: La señora Lourdes se dedica a la confección  y comercialización de enaguas que usan las mujeres de pollera para ponerse debajo de su pollera,  la  venta la realiza en la populosa feria de la ciudad de El Alto,  también tiene dos talleres una se encuentra en la zona de la periférica y otro el en la zona de Alto Tacagua, donde trabaja y contrata mano de obra,  su esposo se dedica a otra actividad es contratista para distintas obras de construcción,  el crédito lo invertirá  para el aumento de su capital compra de telas y una cortadora y así de esta manera mejorar su trabajo ya que tiene muchos pedidos que entregar, ella es una persona muy trabajadora emprendedora con ganas de superación con el tiempo desea poder vender sus productos en la ciudad de Oruro y Cochabamba y así ampliar su mercado, s siente agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Lourdes works making and selling petticoats that women who wear "polleras" [traditional Andean skirts] wear under their skirts.  She makes her sales in the populous market in the city of El Alto.  She also has two workshops, one  in the area of the beltway and the other in the Alto Tacagua area, where she works and hires labor.  Her husband works in another job.  He is a contractor for different construction projects.

She will invest the loan in increasing her capital, purchasing fabric and a cutting machine.  This will improve her job because she has a lot of requests to deliver.

She is a very hardworking and enterprising person who wants to improve her job.  She wants to be able to sell her products in the cities of Oruro and Cochabamba and so increase her market.  She feels grateful to the institution for the support offered.

loans.use: to buy fabric wholesale and a cutting machine.

loans.name: Karina Juana

texts.es: La señora Karina tiene su  tienda de barrio donde ofrece productos de primera necesidad su tienda se encuentra en su propio domicilio que es la  casa  de sus papas,  su tienda tiene mucho tiempo de a poco fue creciendo y surtiendo de mercadería, ahora ya tiene una tienda surtida,   solo trabaja con la institución,  tiene 2 hijos menores  su esposo viaja mucho por cuestiones de trabajo y le manda dinero para ayudar con los gastos del hogar, con el dinero del crédito comprara mercadería como dulces, refrescos galletas, etc. Para surtir su tienda y poder ofrecer variedad de productos a su clientes, ella es muy trabajadora y responsable por el momento hasta que se llegue su esposo se encarga sola de la educación de sus hijos, se siente feliz y agradecida con la institución por el apoyo brindado.
texts.en:
Karina has a neighborhood store where she offers basic goods. Her store is in her house, which is owned by her parents. Her store started small and with time she has grown and accumulated merchandise, and now she has a stocked store.  She works with the institution alone. She has two young children and her husband travels a lot for work. He sends money to help with their household costs.

With the money from the loan she will buy merchandise like candies, sodas, cookies, etc to stock her store and be able to offer a variety of products to her customers. She is very hardworking and responsible and for the moment, until her husband arrives, she is solely in charge of her children's education. She is happy and thankful to the institution for the support they've given her.

loans.use: to buy sweets, beverages, and cookies

loans.name: Dania Del Rosario

texts.es:
La profesora Dania se dedica a la docencia desde hace muchos años, experiencia que tiene en la enseñanza a los niños de primaria lo que le da gran satisfacción porque está aportando un granito de arena al desarrollo de nuestro país que tanto lo necesita.

Su familia está conformada por su esposo y tres hijos todos estudiando, son una familia luchadora y responsable en sus obligaciones y trabajo cualidad que le enseñan a sus hijos.

Con el esfuerzo de su trabajo y los créditos que le ha otorgado Ceprodel han logrado mejorar un poco su vivienda, donde su objetivo consiste en acondicionarla para tener un buen ambiente para vivir con su familia.

En estos momentos su objetivo principal consiste en terminar de mejorar el local de su cocina con todas las condiciones por lo que está solicitando su tercer crédito para la compra de ladrillos, cemento y azulejos para lograr su fin espera la ayuda de Ceprodel ya que en todo momento le ha estrechado su mano para continuar desarrollandose.
texts.en:
Dania is a teacher who has been teaching for many years.  She has experience teaching elementary school children.  Her job gives her a lot of satisfaction because she is contributing her grain of sand toward the development of our country which needs it so much.

Dania's family consists of her husband and three children who are all in school.  They are a hard-working family who are responsible in meeting their obligations and carrying out their work.  This is a quality that they teach their children.

Through the effort of her work and the loans that she has received from Ceprodel, Dania has managed to improve her house a little.  Her goal is to work on the house so that it has a good environment in which she can live together with her family.

Right now, Dania's main goal is to finish improving her kitchen.  She is requesting her third loan so that she can buy bricks, cement and tiles in order to achieve her goal.  She hopes to receive Ceprodel's help as they have always reached out their hand to help her continue making progress.

loans.use: to buy bricks, cement and tiles

loans.name: Solomon

texts.en:
Solomon is 31 years old and married with three children. He builds houses and does welding to earn a living, and he has been in this business for four years. He describes his business environment as good because there is limited competition. 

Since Solomon joined Faulu Kenya, he has been able to expand his business; he hopes to be financially stable in the future. Solomon has applied for 50,000 KES to buy cement and a welding machine.

loans.use: to buy cement and a welding machine.

loans.name: Asunta

texts.en:
Asunta is a 40-year-old married woman with four children, two of whom are in school. She has sold charcoal in Kator, South Sudan for five years.

Asunta is requesting this loan through BRAC South Sudan to purchase charcoal. She will use her extra income from this loan to pay school fees.

loans.use: to purchase charcoal for sale.

loans.name: Ramla

texts.en:
Ramla is a 26-year-old married woman. She has one child who is enrolled in school. Her husband's name is Hamad, and he works as a teacher. 

Ramla operates a retail shop. She's worked in this business for three years, and her primary customers are her neighbors and friends. She describes seasonality as her greatest business challenge, and her highest monthly expense is food. She owns a house that has neither electricity nor piped water. 

Ramla will use the 10,000 KES loan to purchase maize flour, wheat flour, rice, beans, and cooking oil for sale. Ramla aspires to expand her business in the future. She joined Yehu to access funds to expand her business.

loans.use: to purchase maize flour, wheat flour, rice, beans, and cooking oil for sale.

loans.name: Lorenza

texts.es:
La socia pertenece al banco comunal “EL PROGRESO DE UMUTO”; este banco se encuentra situado a tres horas de la misma ciudad del Cusco, en el Distrito de Quispicanchis de la Provincia de Ocongate Departamento de Cusco.
La socia Lorenza; la socia tiene 33 años de edad; ella es casada, la socia se dedica a la administración de su tienda de abarrotes, la socia desea implementar su tienda con la compra de harinas, leche, fideos, azúcar, arroz y otros productos. La socia solicita el préstamo para invertir en la compra de arroz, azúcar, fideos, leche entre otros productos.
La socia agradece la oportunidad del préstamo que le permitirá invertir en el negocio y crecer económicamente.
texts.en: Lorenza belongs to the communal bank "El Progresso" which is located three hours from the city of Cusco, in the district of Quispicanchis and the Ocongate province in the department of Cusco.  She is 33 years old and married.  She runs a grocery store and wants to stock her store with flour, milk, noodles, sugar, rice and other products.  She is requesting a loan to buy rice, sugar, noodles, milk, and other products.  She is grateful for the loan opportunity which will allow her to invest in her business and grow financially.

loans.use: buy rice, sugar, noodles, milk and other products.

loans.name: Lucio

texts.es:
Lucio, se ha decidido por un nuevo crédito, ya que quiere comprarse dos vaquillas y concentrado para alimentarlas, esta compra le ayudara a aumentar el ganado en su terreno, creciendo y mejorando su condición ganadera.
El considera que el préstamo anterior le ayudo para mejorar, teniendo más oportunidades de trabajo.
texts.en:
Lucio has decided to apply for a new loan, as he wishes to buy two heifers and concentrated feed. This purchase will help him to add to the cattle on his land, expanding and improving his livestock. 

He considers that the previous loan helped him improve, by enabling him to have more work opportunities.

loans.use: To buy two heifers and concentrated feed.

loans.name: Marggi

texts.es: Con su anterir  credikiva Marggi compró implementos de panadería, refrescos y dulcería, contrató unpanadero e inició su proceso promocional, inicialmente le fue muy bien, porque logró un contrato con los hogares sustituos del estado y sus utilidades se incrementaron.Como el panadero no cumplió con su trabajo, en la actualidad está comprando los productos de panadería, porque responderá al buen contrato que tiene. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su nuevo credikiva, con el cual comprará panes en un importante volumen para seguir como proveedora de estos hogares porque con ellos le va muy bien y esto se lo debe a su credikiva. En la actualidad su volumen de compras es alto y está muy satisfecha con la inversión permanente en panes, huevos, dulcería entre otros alimentos y articulos de aseo que vende en su punto comercial.
texts.en:
Marggi used her previous loan to buy bakery supplies, soft drinks and sweet treats.  She hired a baker and started a marketing campaign.  At first, things went very well because she got a contract with the children's homes in her state and her profits increased.  However, as her baker didn't manage to carry out his work, she is now buying bakery products so that she can respond to the good contract that she has.  This is why she is applying for a new Kiva loan.  She will use it to buy bread in large volumes so that she can continue as the supplier of these homes because her business with them is going very well and this is due to her Kiva loan.  

Right now, Marggi buys goods wholesale and she is very satisfied with her permanent investment in bread, eggs, sweet treats and also other food products and cleaning products that she sells from her sales premises.

loans.use: to buy bread in large volumes, eggs, sweet treats, other food products and cleaning products

loans.name: Martha Lorena

texts.es: Martha Lorena es una emprendedora que con mucho esfuerzo emprendió su negocio de la venta de tortilla, frijoles cocidos, café esta emprendedora su actividad la realiza de forma ambulante y también en su casa de habitación atiende a sus clientes, ella recorre los mercados de la localidad para ofrecer su producto. Martha Lorena ya ha tenido crédito con Fundación León 2000, lo cual es una emprendedora que es muy responsable y con deseos de superación cada día con su negocio y en lo personal. Martha Lorena está solicitando nuevamente financiamiento para comprar más producto para el negocio lo cual comprara café, maíz, cal, frijoles para brindarle a sus clientes.
texts.en: Martha Lorena is an entrepreneur who worked hard to set up a business selling tortillas, baked beans and coffee.  This entrepreneur carries out her business as an itinerant vendor and also serves her customers from her home.  She travels around the markets in her town to offer her products for sale.  Martha Lorena has already received loans from Fundación León 2000.  She is a very responsible entrepreneur who has a desire to continue making progress in both her business and her personal life.  Martha Lorena is requesting a new loan to buy more products for her business.  She will buy coffee, corn, lime and beans to offer her customers.

loans.use: to buy coffee, corn, lime and beans

loans.name: Rufina

texts.en:
Rufina is a married woman with one child. She is 65 years old and resides in Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur in the Philippines. Rufina owns and operates a farm, planting, harvesting, and selling bananas to earn a living. She's been in this business for 25 years. Each month, she earns 15,000 PHP doing this type of business. 

Rufina requested a loan of 15,000 PHP to purchased fertilizers, such as manure. Rufina has been a member of GDMPC since 2008. In the future, she wants to make improvements to her house and to help her children finish their education.

loans.use: to purchase fertilizer.

loans.name: John

texts.en:
John is 27 years old and married with one child. He runs a motorcycle transport business to earn a living. He has been in this business for six years and employed one person. 

Since he joined Faulu Kenya, John has been able to save his income, and he hopes to expand his business in the future. He has applied for 20,000 KES to buy a motorbike.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike.

loans.name: Oscar Alberto

texts.es:
Oscar es un hombre trabajador y muy responsable, actualmente vive en casa propia que ha logrado construir con mucho esfuerzo junto su esposa y a sus 3 hijos de quienes él es el responsable del sustento familiar, el lugar donde vive Oscar es una comunidad pequeña de nombre “Mochumí” es una zona rural de unas 100 familias residentes aproximadamente, el cual es un distrito de Provincia de Chiclayo y Departamento de Lambayeque y se encuentra a 1 hora aproximadamente.

Oscar tiene como actividad económica la venta de repuestos de bicicletas y motocicletas en un espacio instalado en su propio domicilio, actividad a la que se dedica ya un aproximado de 3 años, según nos comenta Oscar la idea de iniciar mencionado negocio nació de una conversación con su esposa, y es que siempre han estado pendientes de cómo salir adelante y mejorar la educación y alimentación de sus hijos. Por ser una zona rural donde vive Oscar los requerimientos de repuestos para motocicletas son continuos.

Lo que Oscar Invirtió resulta poco para la demanda que tiene en la actualidad por lo que ha decidido solicitar un crédito a Edpyme Alternativa por un monto de 1000 Nuevos Soles, que será utilizado en la compra repuestos y otros accesorios de suma importancia para satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes y así puedan laborar mejor en sus vehículos

Oscar se ha ganado el cariño y el respeto de sus vecinos de quienes cuenta con buenas referencias tanto él como su familia, respeto que se han ganado por su buen carácter y sus buenos valores que transmiten.
texts.en:
Oscar is a hard-working and very responsible man.  He currently lives in his own home which he worked very hard to build.  He lives with his wife and three children, and he is responsible for supporting the family.  Oscar lives in a small community called "Mochumi".  It is a rural place which is home to approximately 100 families and is located in Chiclayo province, in Lambayeque department.

Oscar's business is selling bicycle and motorcycle parts.  He makes his sales from a space that he has set up in his own home and he has been in his business for approximately three years.  Oscar tells us that the idea to set up this business came about during a conversation with his wife.  They have always been alert as to how they can get ahead and improve their children's education and food.  As Oscar lives in a rural area, the need for motorcycle parts is continuous.

The amount that Oscar invested in his business was not enough to deal with the demand that he is currently experiencing.  For this reason, he has decided to request a loan for 1,000 soles from Edpyme Alternativa.  He will use the money to buy spare parts and other very important accessories that he needs to satisfy his customers so that they can work better in their vehicles.

Oscar has gained the affection and respect of his neighbors who provide good references both for him and his family.  He has gained this respect through his good nature and his good values.

loans.use: to purchase large quantities of spare parts to stock his business

loans.name: Saidi

texts.en:
Saidi is applying for another loan to start a motorcycle transportation business, known locally as a boda boda. He will use this 80,000 KES loan to purchase a motorcycle. In the future, Saidi aspires to continue improving his business.

Since taking his last Kiva loan, Saidi has greatly improved his family’s standard of living. He hopes to continue accessing the financial services offered by Yehu and Kiva lenders and thanks you for your support!

loans.use: to purchase a motorcycle for his new transport business.

loans.name: Rael

texts.en:
Rael is 41 years old and supports her four children, aged 18, 16, 14 and 12 years. She is in the taxi business. She started her business five years ago and earns a monthly income of 15,000 KES. 

Rael has applied for a third loan of 60,000 KES to service her car. The anticipated profit would aid in repaying her loan. Her dream is to educate her children.

loans.use: to service her car.

loans.name: Gloria Esther

texts.es: Con su anterior credikiva, Gloria compró útiles escolares, papelería, uniformes y calzado y le fue muy bien. Hoy en esta misma época invertirá en útiles escolares y mercancía variada alusiva al carnaval de Barranquilla que está muy cerca y que trae consigo nuevas ganancias, si se invierte en lo que la temporada exige.  “Mis agradecimientos a la ayuda que esta entidad, FMSD, me ha prestado durante 15 años,  ello ha sido uno de los pilares fundamentales para el crecimiento de mi negocio. Que sigan apoyando a más personas.”
texts.en:
